StringTable.String: Antarctica

StringTable.String: North America

StringTable.Label: CONTINENT_Option7_0

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: What?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are reasonable and open to new deals. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold some precious items out to the screen.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Let's see what you think of making some deals. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option4_0
StringTable.String: No trade happens in my empire without my approval. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We are open to trade, as long as it benefits the citizens of our empire. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option6_0
StringTable.String: For the right price we might be willing to trade with you. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Through fair trade both of our empires can benefit. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Our markets are the envy of the galaxy. Let us see how yours compare. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps we can interest you in some aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ASCENSION_WARNING_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Another race is nearing [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ascension[/COLOR]. We do not know what lies beyond mortality, or what it means to follow the path of the precursors. But if they succeed, the prize will be theirs alone to claim. And we will be become little more than dust in the corners of the galaxy they leave us.[BR][BR]If we want to have any chance of ruling the galaxy, their attempt must be stopped.

StringTable.Label: ASCENSION_WARNING_RESPONSE_DIPLOMACY_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ASCENSION_WARNING_RESPONSE_WAIT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Give me a moment.

StringTable.Label: PRESTIGE_WARNING_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Another civilization is nearing a [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige Victory[/HS]. When the story of our galaxy is written the scholars will remark that they dominated this age, and we will be little more than a minor footnote.[BR][BR]If we want to have our legacy remembered we must act now.

StringTable.Label: PRESTIGE_WARNING_RESPONSE_DIPLOMACY_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PRESTIGE_WARNING_RESPONSE_WAIT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We will consider our options.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We welcome you, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Warm greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We do not know whether you are friend or foe. Only time can answer that. For now, we bid you peace.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option0_2
StringTable.String: So you are the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Rumors have reached us of your kind. We will see soon whether you are a friend or an enemy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option0_3
StringTable.String: I am told that you are called, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This is very interesting to us. Whether we are destined to cooperate or seek mutual extermination remains to be seen.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Another potential slave race. We are always glad to meet new volunteers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: The galaxy seems to be filled with talking meat, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Hello preymeat. Have you come to present yourself for consumption by the Festron? Good. Goooood.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option6_0
StringTable.String: Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Another simple-minded alien, I presume. Twisted by your own childish sense of morality. Well. Let's not let that get between us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Speak openly, alien, so that we might know you friend or foe.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We see hope in your eyes at this encounter. That will pass.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option10_0
StringTable.String: Your life, as you know it, is now over. Soon, you will be our slaves.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option11_0
StringTable.String: A new being. What a delight! No fear yet. The fire still in your eyes. Oh how fast that will change.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Greetings, and welcome. Our civilization has flourished for thousands of years. We know of powers that you cannot even imagine.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option13_0
StringTable.String: More fleshlings. I don't understand the concept of how meat can become sentient.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option14_0
StringTable.String: Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option15_0
StringTable.String: You, alien. Are you the ones we fear and hate? The ones who stole our children? Or are you better? Or worse?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option16_0
StringTable.String: It's always a blessing meeting someone who has not yet found the way of the Krynn. It will be my pleasure to watch you come to understand the truth that we do.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option17_0
StringTable.String: Alien, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option18_0
StringTable.String: We are the true heirs of Altar. You will not stand in our way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option19_0
StringTable.String: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. Let's all do our best to make this a mutually profitable encounter.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option20_0
StringTable.String: Greeting unhived, one. Why do you cross our viewports today?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Your mind reflects the changing nature of your chaotic form.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option22_0
StringTable.String: Are you yet another animal? The galaxy is teaming with you. How interesting.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option23_0
StringTable.String: Greetings! The Advance is always happy to make contact with a new group. We are excited to formally connect.[BR][BR]We are all guided by the same stars in the vast expanse of space. Let's chase the light and create a bright future together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_0
StringTable.String: Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. {LEADERNAME:1}'s primary duty is to wipe you from the galaxy... Oh, and thanks for the Hyperdrive. It will make hunting you down that much easier.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_1
StringTable.String: At last we meet the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. We are powerful and you would be wise to respect our power.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_2
StringTable.String: Ah, the fabled {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Greetings from {LEADERNAME:1}. We've heard tales of your kind. Let's see if they hold true.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_3
StringTable.String: Stars align, and finally we cross paths with the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Let our futures be intertwined in either harmony or doom.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_4
StringTable.String: Oh, the {PLAYERFACTION:2}! At last, a face to the name. And such a face it is. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Mind your business and stay out of our territory.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_5
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} have traversed the void to face us. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Our spores have spread far, and yours is a new scent to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_6
StringTable.String: Gazes from across the galaxy fall upon the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This is {LEADERNAME:1}. Our tendrils stretch far; intertwine with us wisely.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_7
StringTable.String: The cosmic winds whispered of the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Here you are. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Our songs vibrate across star clusters; heed our melody or face dissonance.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_8
StringTable.String: Through the vast black, the {PLAYERFACTION:2} emerge. I, {LEADERNAME:1}, have waited eons. Our cores pulse with energy; align with us or risk eruption.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_9
StringTable.String: The shimmering void reveals the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. I am known as {LEADERNAME:1}. Our scales have shielded us from cosmic tempests; approach with caution lest you feel our bite.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_10
StringTable.String: Space bends, and the {PLAYERFACTION:2} materialize. Greet {LEADERNAME:1}. Our minds span dimensions; connect with grace or face our disconnection.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_11
StringTable.String: The stars unveil the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Witness {LEADERNAME:1}. Our wings blot out suns; soar with us or plummet into the abyss.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_12
StringTable.String: Galactic ripples announce the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You face {LEADERNAME:1}. Our roots drink from cosmic wells; nourish our bond or wither in the void.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_13
StringTable.String: The ether trembles, the {PLAYERFACTION:2} approach. Stand before {LEADERNAME:1}. Our maws hunger for new experiences; feed our curiosity or be consumed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_14
StringTable.String: Celestial bodies align, showing us the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Bow to {LEADERNAME:1}. Our eyes see realms unknown; gaze with us or be blinded by our might.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_15
StringTable.String: We are the illustrious {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Know us and feel the weight of galaxies in our gaze. I am {LEADERNAME:1}, keeper of stars.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_16
StringTable.String: The vast expanse has whispered tales of {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, under the watchful eyes of {LEADERNAME:1}, we see if the whispers were true.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_17
StringTable.String: Before you stands {LEADERNAME:1} of the unparalleled {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our shadow stretches across constellations. Cross us, and you'll feel our cosmic wrath.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_18
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} dare to tread where legends walk. With {LEADERNAME:1} as our beacon, we decide if you'll be ally or another footnote in our story.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_19
StringTable.String: Behold the majesty of the {PLAYERFACTION:1}, under the stewardship of {LEADERNAME:1}. The very nebulas pause to honor our grandeur. Will you?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_20
StringTable.String: The universe's heartbeat synchronizes with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. I, {LEADERNAME:1}, bear the rhythm. Match our tempo or be lost in the cosmic cacophony.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_21
StringTable.String: From black holes to supernovae, nothing shines brighter than {PLAYERFACTION:1}. As {LEADERNAME:1} stands before you, ponder — will you be a beacon with us or merely a flicker?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_22
StringTable.String: Galaxies have risen and fallen, yet the {PLAYERFACTION:1} remain, steadfast and eternal. I am {LEADERNAME:1}. Challenge our eternity at your peril.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_23
StringTable.String: The cosmic tapestry weaves tales of {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Under the vigilant gaze of {LEADERNAME:1}, we'll see if your threads strengthen or tangle the narrative.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option24_24
StringTable.String: Endless cycles, countless civilizations, but none like {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Led by {LEADERNAME:1}, we're the lighthouse in the cosmic void. Sail towards us, or risk the abyss.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option25_0
StringTable.String: A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option26_0
StringTable.String: Jesus Christ, what the hell are you?[BR][BR]You look absolutely monstrous. Sorry, sorry. I was just not expecting something out of my nightmares. Our diplomatic team will clean this up. How are you?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option27_0
StringTable.String: It is good to see you again. We hope we can unite the humans again under a single banner.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option28_0
StringTable.String: We welcome you to what we hope will one day be a united galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option29_0
StringTable.String: You are absolutely too cute to be real.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option30_0
StringTable.String: Based on your looks we must have a common evolutionary ancestor. We should meet and discuss this.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option31_0
StringTable.String: We are always happy to meet the Arcean civilization. We hope together we can build a better future.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option32_0
StringTable.String: The mighty Drengin Empire is once again on the move. Know that we will keeping a close eye on you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option33_0
StringTable.String: We are delighted to meet what many here believe is a related species. We hope to work together with you for the betterment of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option34_0
StringTable.String: Ah, the robotic species known as {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We hope to work with you. If not, we will dismantle you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option35_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to have had a small part in freeing you from the malevolent Drengin Empire. Now your destiny is in our hands.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option36_0
StringTable.String: You are the first space lobsters we've met.[BR][BR]Do not fear our terminology for it is scientific because I used the word space in front of lobster.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option37_0
StringTable.String: We have heard much of your civilization. We have studied a great deal of your lore and history.[BR][BR]Let me be the first to say "Live long and prosper."

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option38_0
StringTable.String: Wonderful, a new market! The {PLAYERFACTION:1} look forward to serving... whatever you are.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option39_0
StringTable.String: Despite you looking quite menacing, we nevertheless hope that we can work together to build a friendship that will span the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option40_0
StringTable.String: Hel-looo. Can you hear me? Hmmm, I don't see any ears.[BR][BR](Why is it always the weird ones we meet?)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option41_0
StringTable.String: ...Sorry, I'm not sure which eye I'm supposed to look at. Those are eyes, right?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option42_0
StringTable.String: May our eggs find your many orifices

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option43_0
StringTable.String: Your worm like bodies will make excellent hosts.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option44_0
StringTable.String: Your fur will make excellent hiding places for my eggs.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option45_0
StringTable.String: Your form is worthless to us. Only biological entities can store our eggs.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option46_0
StringTable.String: Worthless species! How can you serve the Festron if there is no biological mass to lay our eegs in?[BR][BR](Hard-bodied waste of my time.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option47_0
StringTable.String: Haven't we used your carcasses before?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option48_0
StringTable.String: Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers. You may have discovered Hyperdrive but we discovered subspace streams.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option49_0
StringTable.String: We are pleased to meet another species, even one as adorable as you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option50_0
StringTable.String: I assume you are the machine servant for an unseen master? Can you send for them?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option51_0
StringTable.String: Of all the timid species of the universe you alone knew the Precursors. It is tragic that you have lost their memory.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option52_0
StringTable.String: We travel the universe as explorers. But we are also traders. We are happy to meet you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option53_0
StringTable.String: As explorers of the universe, we are ecstatic to bridge the gap between our sectors.[BR][BR](A good friendship here might give us an advantage in understanding the new sector.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option54_0
StringTable.String: This meeting marks some of the farthest-flung sentient life we've ever encountered. Having explored for so long, we thought we knew all the space-faring races.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option55_0
StringTable.String: Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option56_0
StringTable.String: You are absolutely frightening looking.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option57_0
StringTable.String: You look a lot like one of the species that evolved on our world. They were nice. They're dead now.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option58_0
StringTable.String: We hope we can be friends.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option59_0
StringTable.String: I have the distinct feeling that things are not going to end well in our dealings.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option60_0
StringTable.String: Yikes. You look scary.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option61_0
StringTable.String: We remember your civilization well. You were the ones who traded our people to the Drengin for their amusement and food needs.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option62_0
StringTable.String: How strange! Last I saw something like you, I lost an entire wardrobe and had to fumigate an entire freighter.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_0
StringTable.String: Ah, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} graces us with their presence. No doubt you wish to push your limited morality onto us as well. You will find us a lot more challenging to deal with than the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_1
StringTable.String: Well, if it isn't a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} seeking our audience! Let me guess, you came to polish our boots with your high and mighty morals? Sorry to disappoint, mate, but we're a tougher shell to crack than your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] pals.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_2
StringTable.String: Oh, a visitor from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}. How quaint! Have you arrived to enlighten us with your narrow views of right and wrong? Brace yourself, human. We are not your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], and we're not easily swayed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_3
StringTable.String: Ah, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} beacon in our void. Starry-eyed, peddling your flimsy sense of justice? You've met the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS], now meet your match, human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_4
StringTable.String: How unexpected, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} emissary! Here to peddle your simplistic sense of good and evil? You've got it all wrong, human. We're not your [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] playthings.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option63_5
StringTable.String: Well, look what the cosmic tide washed in, a {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} representative! Don't tell me, you're here to impose your black and white morality? Against us, human, your usual tricks won't do. We're not the [HS=HS_Xendar]Xendar[/HS] you've danced with before.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option64_0
StringTable.String: A disgusting bug creature. The universe could not be more ironic.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option65_0
StringTable.String: Space worms. Of course it would be a space worms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option66_0
StringTable.String: We have pests like you on our home world. They may look cute but they are dangerous and deadly.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option67_0
StringTable.String: We have droids that look more useful than you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option68_0
StringTable.String: Ah we are familiar with your species. You may find our way of doing business a little dangerous but in time you will appreciate the margins.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option69_0
StringTable.String: Praytell, have you moved beyond the petty barriers of 'moral' and 'immoral' in your distant galaxies?[BR][BR](Hmmm, what could I call these rock-made creatures that'd be amusing?)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option70_0
StringTable.String: Careful, silk-eater, you are playing with fire. Mind your tongue and distance or burn.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option71_0
StringTable.String: We continue to be grateful for your discovery of hyperdrive.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option72_0
StringTable.String: Ah so the Precursor's minions have returned to our area of space at last.[BR][BR]Something very dark must have driven your kind to cooperate together to this extent.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option73_0
StringTable.String: Our old rivals. We look forward to continuing to see who will dominate this galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option74_0
StringTable.String: You are the species that nearly wiped out the Iconians after the Precursor war. We respect that.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option75_0
StringTable.String: Your civilization has come far over these past centuries. We are glad that we taught you to build a stargate.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option76_0
StringTable.String: So you're a human. The ones who created the Hyperdrive technology. It will be a pleasure to meet you and have you for dinner.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option77_0
StringTable.String: Ah a species with promise.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option78_0
StringTable.String: We will show you mercy because you have discovered subspace streams.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option79_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to find your kind out in the wild. The nutty taste of your flesh is not quite the same as the ones grown on our farms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option80_0
StringTable.String: You are practically ready to be cooked.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option81_0
StringTable.String: Ahh, you are the race with the same soft skin as the humans. Are you as dangerous as they are, I wonder?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option82_0
StringTable.String: So the rumors are true. There is a powerful species of murderbots in the universe. We respect that.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option83_0
StringTable.String: Have you returned to our area of the galaxy in the hopes to become our slaves again?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option84_0
StringTable.String: So the religious fanatics have made it to our part of space.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option85_0
StringTable.String: Ah to meet one of your kind face to face at last.[BR][BR]You no longer hide behind third-party agents. Good. The galactic peddlers will face our wrath if you attempt to swindle us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option86_0
StringTable.String: You'd do well to surrender yourselves to our chains. As slaves, your kind would find great purpose in the glory of our empire.[BR][BR](They look harder to break than bone, but they'll break all the same.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option87_0
StringTable.String: Our prophecies foretold of this meeting, cousin. The mystery of our similar appearances may soon be unraveled.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option88_0
StringTable.String: We will not judge you based on how different you appear but rather on your actions.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option89_0
StringTable.String: You are all together new to us. We have great hope that we can exist together peacefully.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option90_0
StringTable.String: We hope to learn more about your delightful civilization.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option91_0
StringTable.String: Your reputation precedes you. We wish only for peace, for whatever that's worth to you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option92_0
StringTable.String: We value all life, no matter what form it takes.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option93_0
StringTable.String: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. We trust you greet us with similarly peaceful intentions.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option94_0
StringTable.String: We have heard from legends that your race was lost after your service to the Precursors. We are glad to see that those legends were wrong.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option95_0
StringTable.String: It's always a pleasure to meet a potential new friend. We look forward to normalizing relations between our peoples.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option96_0
StringTable.String: Greetings. I hope your time in this section of space has been peaceful. Please let me know if the Altarian Republic can do anything for you.[BR][BR](They look oddly similar. Perhaps they are an early version of us left by the Precursors.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option97_0
StringTable.String: Though I've no reason for this, I suspect there is much we can share and friendships we can forge.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option98_0
StringTable.String: Another example of talking meat. You actually flap a piece of meat to create sounds. Disgusting.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option99_0
StringTable.String: Your species may be something we can work with.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option100_0
StringTable.String: There were rumors that your species had recently organized to form a galactic civilization.[BR][BR]We are skeptical that you did this out of pure chance.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option101_0
StringTable.String: Nothing could have evolved that appears as you that doesn't have an ulterior motive.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option102_0
StringTable.String: We never expected to see your kind again.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option103_0
StringTable.String: We have little need for a species that exists merely to act as a conduit of goods and services for others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option104_0
StringTable.String: Analyzing physical capability to retain and transport a charge as a form of new energy.[BR][BR]([I]No thought can be detected.[/I])

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option105_0
StringTable.String: Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known. If we find the Drengin, we will have our vengeance.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option106_0
StringTable.String: We were slaves of the evil Drengin Empire. We hope you are wary of them if you come into contact with them.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option107_0
StringTable.String: At last, we have found you. Driving you from our homeworld was only the first step on the road to annihilating you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option108_0
StringTable.String: We have not forgotten how you used to sell the processed oils and bone of our people that the Drengin murdered to the minor civilizations in this sector.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option109_0
StringTable.String: I wonder -are you friend or foe? Since encountering other species, we've been battered and enslaved, but we have survived. We will not be turned to food, fuel, and labor again.[BR][BR](I've seen enough of my kind imprisoned and tortured. Never again ...never.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option110_0
StringTable.String: Ah, we have heard rumors of the civilization that first invented the FTL device known as hyperdrive. We hope to learn more about you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option111_0
StringTable.String: We are positively delighted to meet you. We are quickly expanding across the galaxy and hoping to make new friends.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option112_0
StringTable.String: You are a creature unknown to us. We will reserve judgement for now.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option113_0
StringTable.String: You are a new face. An interesting one at that. This sector has taken much from us, and we could use some allies to help find answers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option114_0
StringTable.String: Ah, a new alien. Have you embraced THE WAY?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option115_0
StringTable.String: Your kind can still be uplifted by THE WAY.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option116_0
StringTable.String: We are a species that believes in a universal harmony. All civilizations will one day see this harmony or else.[BR][BR]We can see in your eyes that you will one day join us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option117_0
StringTable.String: Extreme profit is a sin to our civilization. In time we will teach you THE WAY and you will find salvation.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option118_0
StringTable.String: Come, seekers of light. Come, harbingers of harmony. Join us in celebrating the bright, the dark, and the divine.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option119_0
StringTable.String: Human, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were. Our own robotic creations known as The Yor, rose up and took our homeworld.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option120_0
StringTable.String: It has been more than an age since we have encountered your kind. In the days when the Precursors strove the galaxy like giants we remember you with them.[BR][BR]Your kind always worked individually. Never before have you had any interest in gathering like this. We will find the reason.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option121_0
StringTable.String: We have learned in the dark years of our exile that things with large eyes cannot be trusted.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option122_0
StringTable.String: Ah the brutal Drengin Empire has returned to this part of space. You will find that we have little patience for species bent on conquest.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option123_0
StringTable.String: So at long last we meet again. We will take back our homeworld from you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option124_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to meet you directly and not through your agents.[BR][BR]Your terraforming technology allowed us to burn out the native inhabitants of New Iconia.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option125_0
StringTable.String: Your kind is not one I recognize. We, who had given rise to the Yor and watched as the worlds around us established space travel after us, have never seen you. Far you have traveled, but to what end, I wonder.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option126_0
StringTable.String: You -the Precursors never mentioned your kind. How is it now you emerge from distant galaxies with tools of destruction?[BR][BR](Is there more the Precursors hid from us?)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option127_0
StringTable.String: You look like the beings who exiled us from our native planet. We will not suffer the same fate again.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option128_0
StringTable.String: Our legends tell of a species that traveled with the Arnor when we still lived on our first world. We never thought we would meet.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option129_0
StringTable.String: Your appearance almost seems like something out of a dream.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option130_0
StringTable.String: So the tainted Altarians have finally made it into the larger galaxy.[BR][BR]Know that we will eventually return to our homeworld that you stole from us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option131_0
StringTable.String: You look like an abomination of a living thing.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option132_0
StringTable.String: We have longed to meet your civilization. We know you were driven from your homeworld by the wretched machines.[BR][BR]We were exiled from our homeworld by the evil Altarians whose very existence is an abomination.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option133_0
StringTable.String: At last you operate in the open. Our people sometimes miss acting as your agents when the need came to it.[BR][BR]Perhaps we can again come to an arrangement.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option134_0
StringTable.String: Welcome, welcome. It can be so hard to find pleasant company. Come, let us share in the small talk of our newly connected Sectors.[BR][BR](Hehehe, by the time they hear of our reputation, we'll have pocketed all their most lucrative information.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option135_0
StringTable.String: You humans reportedly are no strangers to driving a hard bargain. We look forward to negotiating many profitable deals with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option136_0
StringTable.String: Ah more humans. Your species is always surprising to us at how cunning you can be when trading.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option137_0
StringTable.String: We are happy and grateful to have met you. Your knowledge of these Subspace streams had vastly expanded our potential markets.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option138_0
StringTable.String: What a pleasure to meet you. We are a civilization that values things that have inherent value.[BR][BR]If you are ever of the mind of selling your own kind onto the open market, know that there is definitely an opportunity by working with us. Your adorable pelts would fetch a compelling price on the market.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option139_0
StringTable.String: Does your kind trade? We are a corporation looking to profit. Is there profit to be had with you?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option140_0
StringTable.String: Silicon-based lifeforms? Ah. We can offer many beneficial deals to keep you flush with the resources that help your kind grow.[BR][BR](Hopefully, they're not ignorant enough to try and make do without the market.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option141_0
StringTable.String: The hive welcomes the humans to this part of space.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option142_0
StringTable.String: Our hive has begun to colonize the stars. We have seen many things. But never something quite as striking as you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option143_0
StringTable.String: You are clearly impressive and distinctive from the other species of the galaxy. Perhaps there is a future for both of us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option144_0
StringTable.String: Your face looks familiar to us. For many years, our surface world was ruthlessly harvested for precious metals and gems.[BR]We never actually caught the beings who strip-mined our world before we were ready for the stars but you match the description.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option145_0
StringTable.String: The Hive welcomes you. It's interesting to come across another silicon-based life form. We could have much in common.[BR][BR](They look so frail.)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option146_0
StringTable.String: Another animal. We assumed that the vastness of space would result in far more diversity. It is as if the gods were lazy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option147_0
StringTable.String: You appear different from some of the others. We do not know how to classify your kind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option148_0
StringTable.String: So the legends are true. Our ancient groves sang of beings such as you that explored worlds.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option149_0
StringTable.String: We are optimistic that we can grow together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option150_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to finally meet something that isn't an animal. We are not quite sure what you are.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option151_0
StringTable.String: Your reputation for profit over the wellbeing of others is known to us. You will find no welcome ports with us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option152_0
StringTable.String: Your appearance is brilliant. I hope this first contact can be productive and establish a healthy relationship between our factions.[BR][BR](So help me if the Alliance has soured them to humanity...)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option153_0
StringTable.String: Forgive me if this question is straightforward but recent events have given us cause to change our first contact protocols.[BR][BR]Are your intentions innately hostile or self-serving?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option154_0
StringTable.String: I'll save you the taste of boot and speak first. I represent the Luxar, and yes, I can read your mind. Please be at least vaguely courteous.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option155_0
StringTable.String: Your mind has revealed enough to me. You're a ravaging consumer. Perhaps you can think why I shouldn't consider you an immediate threat.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option156_0
StringTable.String: So that's what's driven your change. Don't worry; your secret is safe with us. All of the other races are far from understanding. It's best not to keep secrets from us; telepathy eventually reveals everything.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option157_0
StringTable.String: Shiny? That's your only impression of us? No, you didn't say that out loud. We can read your mind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option158_0
StringTable.String: Save your insults; they're less creative than you think. Ah, you've already deduced we can read your mind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option159_0
StringTable.String: Such anger. Hmmm. You should be warned; we can foresee your tactics inside your mind. Think twice before declaring us your enemy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option160_0
StringTable.String: You're almost as pleasant as you'd like others to believe you are.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option161_0
StringTable.String: A faction led by Synthetics? Curious.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option162_0
StringTable.String: Your mind is clouded by doctrine. I've telepathically connected with many forms of sentience across the universe, but never anything divine.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option163_0
StringTable.String: Don't dwell on your mistakes. I see you bear tremendous guilt for constructing the Yor, but you'll never be free to thrive till you've rid yourself of that guilt.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option164_0
StringTable.String: Yes, we may be open to trade between our factions. We will have no patience for bad deals, though. We can read your mind and will know if you try to gouge a bargain.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option165_0
StringTable.String: Your mind is so chaotic. Do you frequently juggle that many thoughts at a time? Focusing on fewer things may get you better results. Yes, I can read your mind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option166_0
StringTable.String: We meet again. Hmmm. You've gotten much better at keeping your thoughts hidden. Regardless, we should have expected you to be among the races to explore these new parts of the universe.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option167_0
StringTable.String: Is all you think about death and war?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option168_0
StringTable.String: Searching your mind is like stepping into an echo chamber of chittering children. I always get left with a migraine.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option169_0
StringTable.String: When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option170_0
StringTable.String: We are the Korath! We are the Drengin unafraid to rid the galaxy of repulsive species like you. If you serve us, I'll consider delaying your eradication.[BR][BR]([I]All you sense is a rage without words.[/I])

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option171_0
StringTable.String: Your efficiency and resilience are clear to us. We have no love for efforts of destruction, though, and hope for peace.[BR][BR](Keep the mind clear, keep the mind clear, keep the mind clear...)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option172_0
StringTable.String: We see you. We watch you. We learn. We take to space.[BR][BR](We we we we we See see see see see)

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option173_0
StringTable.String: [I]The many blinking eyes appear vacant but maintain contact through the display.[/I][BR][BR]([I]The mind of the Irradiated lifeform is a chaotic bubble of unintelligible sounds.[/I])

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option174_0
StringTable.String: Our scientists say your day-night cycle last only a handful of hours. That's truly fascinating.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option175_0
StringTable.String: Ah! Apologies and greetings. Your physique resembles ancient predators that plagued our kind. Let's hope for a better relationship.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option176_0
StringTable.String: Early reports indicated you've been long among the stars. There is much we can share.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option177_0
StringTable.String: Your reputation would have us hesitate to offer trust, but we hope to see the good in everyone. How can we help you?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option178_0
StringTable.String: Oh! Our intelligence indicates you have a dedication to neutrality and balance. We share much common ground (metaphorically) -fertile ash for a strong alliance. Shall we talk more?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option179_0
StringTable.String: Greeting. We struggle to see the reason for brutality in this vast expanse filled with light and life. Let's find a brighter future.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option180_0
StringTable.String: Greetings. Tales of your tenacity and determination command respect. Let's see what we can share.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option181_0
StringTable.String: Your glowing eyes and shining exoskeleton are genuinely glorious. We hope to form a strong alliance.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option182_0
StringTable.String: We admire what you've achieved in bringing so many groups together. We remain skeptical of religion but look forward to working together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option183_0
StringTable.String: We hope that some friendly trade negotiations will lead to much deeper friendships.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option184_0
StringTable.String: Before taking to the stars, we would have never imagined large complex plants, let alone ones that could negotiate.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option185_0
StringTable.String: While we respect your strong will and individuality, no being is a star. We thrive when we work together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option186_0
StringTable.String: Your efficiency and resilience are clear to us. We have no love for efforts of destruction, though, and hope for peace.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option187_0
StringTable.String: While we hold little hope of alliance, we extend it nonetheless. It's always possible to recognize the strength of differences and collaboration.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option188_0
StringTable.String: You see more than you tell; this we know. Should you decide to share your insight, we'd be happy to listen.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option189_0
StringTable.String: Can you understand us? We have yet to determine if you are a blight or boon to the universe's life.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Huh?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to meet you, {LEADERNAME:1}. May our civilizations work together for a better future.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option1_1
StringTable.String: I believe we can work together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option1_2
StringTable.String: We greet you with a hope to the future.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option1_3
StringTable.String: We hope we can build a mutually beneficial relationship.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option2_0
StringTable.String: You will regret this, {LEADERNAME:1}.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option2_1
StringTable.String: We are going to destroy you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option2_2
StringTable.String: There will never be peace between us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option2_3
StringTable.String: We will catalog your history after we wipe you out.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to have finally met.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option4_0
StringTable.String: I think you would find us difficult to digest.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Very well, same back to you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option6_0
StringTable.String: You can be assured that we were not planning to eat you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option6_1
StringTable.String: There is a reasonable chance we were not going to eat you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option6_2
StringTable.String: I think you would give us indigestion.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option7_0
StringTable.String: We hope we are able to work with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option7_1
StringTable.String: Oh we love working with criminals.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Greetings. Our relationship depends mostly on whether you will respect our territory.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option9_0
StringTable.String: I suspect we are not going to get along.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option9_1
StringTable.String: Are those screams I hear in the background?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option10_0
StringTable.String: That is not at all ominous.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option10_1
StringTable.String: You are a little spooky.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Looks can be deceiving.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option11_1
StringTable.String: We have no problem interacting with a machine intelligence.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option12_0
StringTable.String: You have nothing to fear. We have no intention of making you slaves..today.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option13_0
StringTable.String: I can assure you that we are probably maybe not a threat.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option14_0
StringTable.String: We have our own way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option15_0
StringTable.String: That is a shame. We hope to build a better future with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option16_0
StringTable.String: You look like a dragon. Has anyone mentioned that?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option17_0
StringTable.String: Well, I do like money. A lot.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option18_0
StringTable.String: We look forward to building a better future with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option19_0
StringTable.String: We sense no true hostility from you and hope that it remains so.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option20_0
StringTable.String: An animal? As opposed to what? A plant or mineral? Right... a plant

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Let's maintain this hopeful and friendly relationship.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option22_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to finally meet you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option23_0
StringTable.String: You humans are supposed to be diplomatic. You have failed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option24_0
StringTable.String: We will unite under my rule.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option25_0
StringTable.String: We are optimistic that we won't need to destroy you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option26_0
StringTable.String: Don't let our cuteness fool you. We are also adorable.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option27_0
StringTable.String: I suspect it had more to do with ecomorphism.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option28_0
StringTable.String: The future remains to be seen, human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option29_0
StringTable.String: We shall pluck those cow eyes out of your skull, human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option30_0
StringTable.String: We are a more perfect version of you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option31_0
StringTable.String: The flappings of talking meat are irrelevant.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option32_0
StringTable.String: Our destiny is ours. We shall forge it as we see fit.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option33_0
StringTable.String: Your diplomatic reputation precedes you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option34_0
StringTable.String: Sigh.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option35_0
StringTable.String: We look forward to doing business.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option36_0
StringTable.String: We understand if you need some diplomatic training.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option37_0
StringTable.String: We can hear you just fine, and your thoughts are clear -weird is relative.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option38_0
StringTable.String: Do not lay eggs in us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option39_0
StringTable.String: Our insides are very acidic.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option40_0
StringTable.String: That is very gross.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option41_0
StringTable.String: You would do well to speak diplomatically to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option42_0
StringTable.String: Your nature is unimportant to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option43_0
StringTable.String: Crass. In the future, let's find something useful to discuss.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option44_0
StringTable.String: You should research more independent ways to reproduce.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option45_0
StringTable.String: We are very impressed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option46_0
StringTable.String: We have a natural fear of you. Our ancestors were preyed upon by beings like you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option47_0
StringTable.String: This sounds very promising.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option48_0
StringTable.String: You are mistaken. We are the ultimate form of life.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option49_0
StringTable.String: Their memory, our birthright, shall be reclaimed in due time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option50_0
StringTable.String: Our ports are always open.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option51_0
StringTable.String: There will be surprises as long as there are stars.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option52_0
StringTable.String: We kindly welcome peaceful explorers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option53_0
StringTable.String: We can assure you that we are not looking to eat you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option54_0
StringTable.String: You will find our eggs comforting within your bodies.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option55_0
StringTable.String: We hope to show the universe to you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option56_0
StringTable.String: We will definitely be killing your kind soon.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option57_0
StringTable.String: We are scary.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option58_0
StringTable.String: We all have to find a way to make a living.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option59_0
StringTable.String: Ha! Truly fascinating how similar forms take different paths throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option60_0
StringTable.String: Despite your attitude, we are willing to work with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option61_0
StringTable.String: The green hairless mammal has opinions.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option62_0
StringTable.String: You have us to thank for the subspace streams.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option63_0
StringTable.String: It must have been hard for you to say that. Thank you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option64_0
StringTable.String: Bold words from a weak fleshling.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option65_0
StringTable.String: If we were capable of feeling amusement, your unearned arrogance would merit such a feeling.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option66_0
StringTable.String: As long as it's technically legal we are always happy to work with others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option67_0
StringTable.String: This relationship will require some effort.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option68_0
StringTable.String: Morality is more than a philosophical exercise.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option69_0
StringTable.String: Always pleased to speak to another civilized species.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option70_0
StringTable.String: You have no idea.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option71_0
StringTable.String: You would do well to learn some respect.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option72_0
StringTable.String: You're not in competition with us. You're not even in the game.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option73_0
StringTable.String: We don't require respect. Only obedience.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option74_0
StringTable.String: We hope to continue a mutual beneficial relationship with you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option75_0
StringTable.String: We are not digestible. I'm just going to get that right out there.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option76_0
StringTable.String: There might be a future for you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option77_0
StringTable.String: I don't think I like you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option78_0
StringTable.String: It remains to be seen whether we will be friends or adversaries.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option79_0
StringTable.String: I suspect you say that to everyone.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option80_0
StringTable.String: Wouldn't you want to at least remove our hair?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option81_0
StringTable.String: There is more to us than what you can see.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option82_0
StringTable.String: You may be something we can work with.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option83_0
StringTable.String: We will never again serve you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option84_0
StringTable.String: The Way is not a religion. It is a philosophy that brings many species together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option85_0
StringTable.String: We would never dream of swindling one as noble and civilized as, eh, you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option86_0
StringTable.String: Mindless suffering only propagates hate.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option87_0
StringTable.String: With respect to your "empire," I decline.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option88_0
StringTable.String: I'm not really sure what to say to this.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option89_0
StringTable.String: We will reserve our judgement on you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option90_0
StringTable.String: We know of your world from the Hiergemenon.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option91_0
StringTable.String: We feel the same about you, your blueness.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option92_0
StringTable.String: There is only one form of life.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option93_0
StringTable.String: We are open for business.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option94_0
StringTable.String: Then our future together is bright!

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option95_0
StringTable.String: We won't hesitate to reach out.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option96_0
StringTable.String: We have no problem working with robot people.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option97_0
StringTable.String: Robots make poor hatcheries for our eggs. Perhaps we can work together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option98_0
StringTable.String: Our reasons are our own.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option99_0
StringTable.String: You sound like the other 5 sentient species that co-evolved with us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option100_0
StringTable.String: You drove us from our home world.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option101_0
StringTable.String: I am sure you will need spare parts eventually.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option102_0
StringTable.String: Please stop.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option103_0
StringTable.String: We are obviously not Drengin.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option104_0
StringTable.String: We have no use for slaves. Your damaged eye intrigues us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option105_0
StringTable.String: But we like everyone.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option106_0
StringTable.String: We left your world because there was nothing left of value.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option107_0
StringTable.String: You will have to prove you are more than slavelings.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option108_0
StringTable.String: You have to understand that Torian oils are a delicacy. If anything, we are the victims here.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option109_0
StringTable.String: We lost many to other species as well. We may share enemies.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option110_0
StringTable.String: We look forward to exploring the universe together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option111_0
StringTable.String: You have a friend in us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option112_0
StringTable.String: My advice to you is that you stay out of our way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option113_0
StringTable.String: You will be able to judge us on our chara-excellent prices and sales.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option114_0
StringTable.String: No one should struggle alone. You may count on us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option115_0
StringTable.String: We are open to new ideas.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option116_0
StringTable.String: We are not interested.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option117_0
StringTable.String: We shall see.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option118_0
StringTable.String: Our adorable eyes and sharp teeth greet you and your way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option119_0
StringTable.String: We have no need for superstition.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option120_0
StringTable.String: We are big supporters of THE WAY. The statue of Kyndras is one of our best sellers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option121_0
StringTable.String: We accept your friendship but not your theology.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option122_0
StringTable.String: You have nothing to fear from us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option123_0
StringTable.String: Our reasons are our own.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option124_0
StringTable.String: Were those eyes at cute as ours?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option125_0
StringTable.String: Your civilization is already dead. You just don't know it yet.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option126_0
StringTable.String: We took your homeworld because you were too weak.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option127_0
StringTable.String: We are always here to help.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option128_0
StringTable.String: We chase the light, looking for life at every star.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option129_0
StringTable.String: We carry the tools of our own protection. You have yet to encounter the filth we have.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option130_0
StringTable.String: You seriously look like a dragon.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option131_0
StringTable.String: We have our own interests to attend to.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option132_0
StringTable.String: You may be a useful ally in what is to come.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option133_0
StringTable.String: That seems a little ironic coming from you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option134_0
StringTable.String: We hope we can find a peaceful future together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option135_0
StringTable.String: We are more alive than a fleshing ever could be.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option136_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps together we can both return to our homeworlds.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option137_0
StringTable.String: There is always work for a 3 meter tall dragon.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option138_0
StringTable.String: We prefer to keep our dealings in the light.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option139_0
StringTable.String: Thank you. I'd love to hear so much about your sector first.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option140_0
StringTable.String: I believe you are a species we can do business with.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option141_0
StringTable.String: We shall see.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option142_0
StringTable.String: We are hopeful that we can forge a future together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option143_0
StringTable.String: I'm not sure we are going to get along.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option144_0
StringTable.String: The laws of supply and demand are not bounded by biology.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option145_0
StringTable.String: Another time, maybe.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option146_0
StringTable.String: That giant rifle doesn't look very welcoming.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option147_0
StringTable.String: A species that is made of stone is something new to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option148_0
StringTable.String: I am choosing to take that as a compliment.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option149_0
StringTable.String: That weapon you hold is impressive.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option150_0
StringTable.String: We deny ever stealing all the Nemandic gems from your sacred shrines.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option151_0
StringTable.String: There may be some common ground we can find.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option152_0
StringTable.String: We are different from the others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option153_0
StringTable.String: We remember the sentient trees of your world when they were saplings.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option154_0
StringTable.String: That is not as heartwarming as you might have thought it sounded.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option155_0
StringTable.String: We were made to be beyond biology.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option156_0
StringTable.String: Our profits are what improves the wellbeing of the the universe.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option157_0
StringTable.String: Prove yourselves worthy of our attention, and we can maintain a positive relationship.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option158_0
StringTable.String: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option159_0
StringTable.String: I'll make it a point to be nicer the next time you violate my privacy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option160_0
StringTable.String: Your kind is no good to us without fleshy bits.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option161_0
StringTable.String: We appreciate your discretion.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option162_0
StringTable.String: But you are so shiny!

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option163_0
StringTable.String: Ha! No remorse over such a violation? Lovely.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option164_0
StringTable.String: I don't need to read minds to tell you're not as special as you think.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option165_0
StringTable.String: Telepathy? Your kind is curiously blessed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option166_0
StringTable.String: Why are you making intense eye contact?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option167_0
StringTable.String: Not even your powerful mind can find all the answers.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option168_0
StringTable.String: You know this? Oh, I understand -telepathy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option169_0
StringTable.String: We'd never deal in bad faith.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option170_0
StringTable.String: I'll take your advice into consideration.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option171_0
StringTable.String: They are all that is worth thinking about.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option172_0
StringTable.String: Pleasant to cross paths, as always.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option173_0
StringTable.String: We're sorry.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option174_0
StringTable.String: [I]Focus on kind thoughts.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option175_0
StringTable.String: Your naivety and cleverness are constantly at odds. You continue to surprise me.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option176_0
StringTable.String: Keep to your section of space, and we'll consider forgiving your ilk.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option177_0
StringTable.String: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option178_0
StringTable.String: There's much we can learn from our differences.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option179_0
StringTable.String: Processing compliment.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option180_0
StringTable.String: Did they go extinct from hunger? You seem far too nutrient-deficient to make good hosts.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option181_0
StringTable.String: We are hopeful there is much to share about our sectors.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option182_0
StringTable.String: I've no time for this righteous naivety.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option183_0
StringTable.String: A stable alliance between us may go a long way for all.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option184_0
StringTable.String: You look like you'd make poor slaves.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option185_0
StringTable.String: Help us find that which was stolen and we can be allies.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option186_0
StringTable.String: Skepticism and healthy debate are the bedrock of faith.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option187_0
StringTable.String: We look forward to your business.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option188_0
StringTable.String: Maybe our differences can complement each other.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option189_0
StringTable.String: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option190_0
StringTable.String: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option191_0
StringTable.String: We hear. We will see.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option192_0
StringTable.String: [I]Blink several times quickly.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Fake smile and nod as if you understand, then proceed to close the Incoming Message.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Space is big. Probably big enough for both of us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Do not get in our way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option1_2
StringTable.String: We are skeptical about ever becoming friendly.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Your claims are irrelevant to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We always enjoy talking to hairless apes.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Be careful or you may find yourself stepped on.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option4_0
StringTable.String: What the hell are you?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option5_0
StringTable.String: But are you cute.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We're going to murder you last.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Let's be honest, we're probably going to be foes.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We may look gentle on the outside, but don't mistake that for weakness.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option9_0
StringTable.String: I am pretty sure your grandfather was my chair.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option10_0
StringTable.String: Your naivety is almost laughable.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option11_0
StringTable.String: There is no future for you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option12_0
StringTable.String: We are the beings who will eventually use your bodies as hosts for our young.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option13_0
StringTable.String: It is doubtful our civilizations will ever reunite.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option14_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to have met you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We are very cute if you ignore the bones and gore.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option16_0
StringTable.String: We have no interest in you or your so-called civilization.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option17_0
StringTable.String: Our past friendships do not affect our future.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option18_0
StringTable.String: We should work together. We have much in common.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option19_0
StringTable.String: We shall see, human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option20_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Do not get in our way, human.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option22_0
StringTable.String: I still have hope we can work together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option23_0
StringTable.String: We will bring everyone of your kind, except you, into The Way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option24_0
StringTable.String: It appears we have common interests.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option25_0
StringTable.String: Please note for the future that these weird ones can read your mind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option26_0
StringTable.String: Our time is better spent communicating with others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option27_0
StringTable.String: You can't lay eggs in us. Well, you probably could but don't.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option28_0
StringTable.String: Don't even think of it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option29_0
StringTable.String: We had a species like yours on our planet. They're dead now.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option30_0
StringTable.String: Simply disgusting.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option31_0
StringTable.String: We literally eat your kind for breakfast.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option32_0
StringTable.String: The ramblings of talking bugs amuses us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option33_0
StringTable.String: Your eggs will become our fuel.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option34_0
StringTable.String: We have dealt with far worse than you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option35_0
StringTable.String: Very amusing.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option36_0
StringTable.String: We will not hesitate to turn any species that threatens us to glass.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option37_0
StringTable.String: No, but you resemble monsters we've survived before.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option38_0
StringTable.String: We exterminated a species that looked similar to you long ago.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option39_0
StringTable.String: Your pitiful attempts at insults mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option40_0
StringTable.String: We didn't forget the Precursors. They were before our time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option41_0
StringTable.String: Hopefully we can find something that will serve your kind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option42_0
StringTable.String: We are not interested in abetting your advantage.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option43_0
StringTable.String: The stars are many. How can you assume to have explored them all?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option44_0
StringTable.String: Only time will tell if you are delicious or not.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option45_0
StringTable.String: We will keep your species alive on farms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option46_0
StringTable.String: Things that look harmless rarely are.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option47_0
StringTable.String: I wonder how difficult it will be to remove your fur.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option48_0
StringTable.String: We will convert you into a more useful biomechanical paste.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option49_0
StringTable.String: Are we to blame that your species tastes so good?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option50_0
StringTable.String: Were you larger, I'd consider that a threat.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option51_0
StringTable.String: You will find that we are made of stern stuff.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option52_0
StringTable.String: Soft flesh on a hard skeleton is such an ineffective design.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option53_0
StringTable.String: We will uplift your machines to gain mastery over you.
