StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option54_0
StringTable.String: We have little in common with a criminal empire.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option55_0
StringTable.String: We prioritize our protection; remember that hair-crowned.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option56_0
StringTable.String: Careful yourself -we've survived where others conflagrated.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option57_0
StringTable.String: There are things much worse than Dread Lords in this universe.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option58_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option59_0
StringTable.String: We remember you selling a stargate that would allow you to invade our homeworld.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option60_0
StringTable.String: We hope for peace. But we will also crush you if necessary.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option61_0
StringTable.String: You reek of malevolence

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option62_0
StringTable.String: If anyone ever needed a good blasting, it's you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option63_0
StringTable.String: We have very large and pointy teeth.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option64_0
StringTable.String: We do not require you to understand us. Only obey.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option65_0
StringTable.String: We will have our vengeance yet.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option66_0
StringTable.String: Our Jihad will consume you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option67_0
StringTable.String: Remember that we still have agents. They simply perform a more lethal kind of business.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option68_0
StringTable.String: You will not "break" us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option69_0
StringTable.String: A culture of war is one designed to disintegrate.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option70_0
StringTable.String: Prophecy or crude manipulation you mean.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option71_0
StringTable.String: Our actions involve laying eggs inside of you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option72_0
StringTable.String: We know enough about you to be wary of your claims of wanting peace.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option73_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option74_0
StringTable.String: Well met.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option75_0
StringTable.String: We are happy to try and work with anyone.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option76_0
StringTable.String: If there is a relation, we're the perfected form.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option77_0
StringTable.String: You look like something out of a nightmare.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option78_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option79_0
StringTable.String: We know what you did to the Iconians. You will find us a difficult foe if it comes to that.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option80_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option81_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option82_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option83_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option84_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option85_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option86_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option87_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option88_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option89_0
StringTable.String: We will take back what is ours.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option90_0
StringTable.String: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option91_0
StringTable.String: We bring joy and happiness through our products. Something you obviously don't understand.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option92_0
StringTable.String: Do you really want to discuss who makes the better battery?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option93_0
StringTable.String: Your freedom or slavery remains to be seen.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option94_0
StringTable.String: We don't care.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option95_0
StringTable.String: Ah, Torians. I have a dozen of you frozen for the New Argon feast.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option96_0
StringTable.String: Your only value is your ability to populate quickly.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option97_0
StringTable.String: We suffered from the loss supply of your species.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option98_0
StringTable.String: We lost many to other species as well. We will go to any lengths to protect ourselves.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option99_0
StringTable.String: You actually look like what I had for dinner yesterday.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option100_0
StringTable.String: We are definitely the stuff of nightmares.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option101_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option102_0
StringTable.String: I don't suppose you sell your children as a food commodity.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option103_0
StringTable.String: Every story has two sides, if not more.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option104_0
StringTable.String: Eyes are high in fats that our young like.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option105_0
StringTable.String: You should just leave us alone.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option106_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option107_0
StringTable.String: Those who claim to be pure of heart are the biggest consumers of our less savory products.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option108_0
StringTable.String: We find it hard to accept that which establishes division.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option109_0
StringTable.String: You do not want to know what we know.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option110_0
StringTable.String: Are you leaving out the part that those eyes were evil robot eyes you created?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option111_0
StringTable.String: I will have your skull in my trophy case soon enough.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option112_0
StringTable.String: Empty words from a dying species.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option113_0
StringTable.String: We equally support natural and unnatural selection.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option114_0
StringTable.String: Trusting dead gods is folly; there's always more they've hidden.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option115_0
StringTable.String: We mean no harm if that is the answer you hope to tease of us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option116_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option117_0
StringTable.String: You may find you wished we never met.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option118_0
StringTable.String: Your villainous actions led to your exile. Own it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option119_0
StringTable.String: You are a doomed relic of a dead past.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option120_0
StringTable.String: You were exiled because you lost your war of aggression. Our world was stolen. We are not the same.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option121_0
StringTable.String: We miss having you as one of our agents.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option122_0
StringTable.String: You may find us harder to deceive than you think.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option123_0
StringTable.String: No good comes from clinging to the dark.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option124_0
StringTable.String: We don't trust you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option125_0
StringTable.String: Eyes are high in fats that our young like. We are going to get along well.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option126_0
StringTable.String: Your greed won't save you from what is to come.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option127_0
StringTable.String: Maybe later.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option128_0
StringTable.String: We trade only when we can't take by force.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option129_0
StringTable.String: We've survived without your market for eons; we'll be fine without it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option130_0
StringTable.String: We are both quite different from the others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option131_0
StringTable.String: I hope we can work together giant gun guy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option132_0
StringTable.String: I doubt your species has a future at all.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option133_0
StringTable.String: We get that a lot.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option134_0
StringTable.String: Let's see who looks frail when your porous bodies are turned to glass.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option135_0
StringTable.String: Your bodies are useless to us. Be gone.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option136_0
StringTable.String: Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option137_0
StringTable.String: The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option138_0
StringTable.String: Your words mean nothing to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option139_0
StringTable.String: We are hopeful we can still do business together.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option140_0
StringTable.String: So this is what the Individualism of the Terrans brings -fractured groups.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option141_0
StringTable.String: We help those willing to help others.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option142_0
StringTable.String: I know.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option143_0
StringTable.String: I'll save my breath and let my mind do the talking.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option144_0
StringTable.String: We are a threat, even to hostless bodies like yours.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option145_0
StringTable.String: You can keep your assumptions to yourself.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option146_0
StringTable.String: Rude.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option147_0
StringTable.String: Read away. I've no shame in our rejection of pitiful laws made by the weak.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option148_0
StringTable.String: Disgusting! Get in my head again, and I'll rip yours off.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option149_0
StringTable.String: You'll fit right in with the species of our sector. They refuse to recognize our elevated development as well.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option150_0
StringTable.String: Conversation: boring. Terminating dialogue.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option151_0
StringTable.String: To find The Way, one must first find humility. We'll be here when you do.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option152_0
StringTable.String: I have little patience for your arrogance.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option153_0
StringTable.String: We'll need to trust each other to deal fairly.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option154_0
StringTable.String: Warn me next time. I'll give you something more interesting to read.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option155_0
StringTable.String: Are you reading my mind? I'll turn you into a mirror!

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option156_0
StringTable.String: I hope we can keep this civil.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option157_0
StringTable.String: We disapprove.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option158_0
StringTable.String: [I]Focus on angry thoughts.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option159_0
StringTable.String: We've survived worse and uglier than you. Reach out when you're done with your tantrum.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option160_0
StringTable.String: Take a breath before you pass out. You're far from a threat to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option161_0
StringTable.String: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option162_0
StringTable.String: It's only a matter of time before we can wipe the universe of your blight.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option163_0
StringTable.String: Yup, we're pretty cool.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option164_0
StringTable.String: Motives for praise: questionable.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option165_0
StringTable.String: You'd do well to keep us in your nightmares.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option166_0
StringTable.String: There may be something to share if you survive contact with this sector.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option167_0
StringTable.String: Your quick demise will be helpful enough.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option168_0
StringTable.String: True neutrality is rare; we are skeptical of your intentions.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option169_0
StringTable.String: We'll give you plenty of reasons to embrace brutality.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option170_0
StringTable.String: We'll share when you have proven yourself beyond suspicion.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option171_0
StringTable.String: It's ill-advised to work with those who question The Way.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option172_0
StringTable.String: Business has no use for friendship.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option173_0
StringTable.String: Hm. That remains to be seen.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option174_0
StringTable.String: Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option175_0
StringTable.String: Keep your hope; it's a mistake.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option176_0
StringTable.String: We hear. We ignore.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option177_0
StringTable.String: Flounder around wildly.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](We've just conquered one of your planets.)

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We've just conquered one of your planets.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We have liberated one of your worlds.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option4_0
StringTable.String: One of your worlds is now under our control.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We have set free the people of one of your planets.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option7_0
StringTable.String: We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option10_0
StringTable.String: Your planet is now ours.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option11_0
StringTable.String: We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option13_0
StringTable.String: We hope you understand that this planet is now under our care.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option14_0
StringTable.String: The people of the world we just took can now know true safety.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option4_0
StringTable.String: War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option7_0
StringTable.String: We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option11_0
StringTable.String: You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option12_0
StringTable.String: It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option13_0
StringTable.String: This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option14_0
StringTable.String: Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option16_0
StringTable.String: We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option17_0
StringTable.String: It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option18_0
StringTable.String: Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option19_0
StringTable.String: We will not simply wait for your attack, we made that mistake already.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option20_0
StringTable.String: You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, the time has come to admit diplomacy is no longer of service between us. We do not revel in this decision, but we must do our part to promote security -even if it means going to war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option22_0
StringTable.String: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option23_0
StringTable.String: We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option24_0
StringTable.String: Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option25_0
StringTable.String: We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option26_0
StringTable.String: We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.[BR][BR]Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option27_0
StringTable.String: We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.[BR][BR]We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option28_0
StringTable.String: Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option29_0
StringTable.String: I hardly believe the day has come to declare war with your faction. Follow the light into the beam of our lasers and the explosions of our rockets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option30_0
StringTable.String: You've benefited from our developments long enough.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option31_0
StringTable.String: The time has come to cleanse the galaxy of your filth. This war will not repeat our previous conflict; we come prepared.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option32_0
StringTable.String: We've given every chance and benefit of the doubt. We can no longer ignore your threat to life across the universe. I'm sorry, it's come time to burn.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option33_0
StringTable.String: We've observed enough and have concluded that you are a tumor. Life is to be valued, but you only survive as others perish.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option34_0
StringTable.String: We declare war. We don't need you anymore.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option35_0
StringTable.String: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You will regret this. Whatever you are.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: You have made a fatal mistake.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: We shall make you suffer for this.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: You will be our slaves when this is over.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are going to crush you.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Your worlds will soon be our property

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option5_0
StringTable.String: You will not be spared the full extent of our armament and telepathic tactics.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We will convert your organs into fuel.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option7_0
StringTable.String: The only good bug is a dead bug.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option8_0
StringTable.String: This will be the last error your kind makes.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option9_0
StringTable.String: It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option10_0
StringTable.String: You have made a fatal error.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option11_0
StringTable.String: You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option12_0
StringTable.String: You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option13_0
StringTable.String: I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option14_0
StringTable.String: When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We will use what's left of you for spare parts.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option16_0
StringTable.String: You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We will boil you for dinner.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option18_0
StringTable.String: You will die, fanatic.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option19_0
StringTable.String: You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option20_0
StringTable.String: It appears we must slay another beast.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option21_0
StringTable.String: We will loot what's left of your worlds.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option22_0
StringTable.String: You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option23_0
StringTable.String: Today, we find this choice immensely regrettable. Tomorrow so will you.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option24_0
StringTable.String: We are displeased.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option25_0
StringTable.String: [I]Flail angrily at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option26_0
StringTable.String: The Luxar do not burn.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option27_0
StringTable.String: I see you've learned to be ungrateful. So be it.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option28_0
StringTable.String: This conflict will not end until we purge you from the universe.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I'm sorry?

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Disappointing. But not a surprise.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option1_1
StringTable.String: So be it.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option2_0
StringTable.String: You will rue the day you declared war.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Please don't hurt us.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option4_0
StringTable.String: I wish we had found a way to do business together.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We knew we should never have expanded.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option6_0
StringTable.String: I've seen your mind. I'm not surprised.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Whatever you say, roach.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option9_0
StringTable.String: You will wish you had never been hatched.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We are very disappointed.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option11_0
StringTable.String: We are saddened that you have chosen death.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option12_0
StringTable.String: You have made a terrible mistake.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option13_0
StringTable.String: You have fallen away from logic.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option14_0
StringTable.String: So the slave now wants to be a slaver?

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option15_0
StringTable.String: So the true nature of The Way is revealed.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option16_0
StringTable.String: You will lose.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We had hoped we could work together. Alas.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option18_0
StringTable.String: This will not be a profitable venture for you.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option19_0
StringTable.String: How much effort you put into paranoid warmongering is a pity.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option20_0
StringTable.String: We are disgruntled.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option21_0
StringTable.String: [I]Droop sadly at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option22_0
StringTable.String: And you think you're informed enough to make that decision?

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option23_0
StringTable.String: I had such higher hopes for your kind.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option24_0
StringTable.String: We knew this day would come. Already I mourn the dead this conflict will leave in its wake.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, this war has not necessarily gone in the direction we had intended. We would have peace.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_1
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we are weary of the conflict and the toll it has taken. Could we not establish tranquility between us?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_2
StringTable.String: We, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, propose to cease hostilities. What say you to a peaceful resolution?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_3
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:1} extends an olive branch to you. Will you grasp it and bring an end to this conflict?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_4
StringTable.String: Enough, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we have seen enough destruction. Shall we put an end to this and live in harmony?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_5
StringTable.String: This war, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has drained us. We wish for serenity. Will you not consider a peaceful coexistence?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_6
StringTable.String: Could we, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, not strive for peace rather than continue this endless battle?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_7
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we seek to resolve our differences. Shall we walk the path of peace together?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_8
StringTable.String: War has grown old, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We extend our hand in peace. Will you accept?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_9
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, let us end the cycle of violence. What do you say to a pact of peace?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option1_10
StringTable.String: We have battled long and hard, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, we offer a proposition of peace. Will you embrace it?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Hrm?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Very well.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_COUNTER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: How 'bout no?

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: It is far too late now.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Your rejection saddens us, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The ensuing conflict is a product of your decision.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_2
StringTable.String: We offered peace, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you chose war. The consequences are yours to bear.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Your refusal means more destruction, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Remember, it was your choice.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_4
StringTable.String: We find your decision unfortunate, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The bloodshed that follows is on your hands.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_5
StringTable.String: Despite our plea for peace, you persist, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You have chosen this path of conflict.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_6
StringTable.String: We had wished for tranquility, but your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has determined a different course.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_7
StringTable.String: You have made your choice, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, and regrettably, it is one that leads to further strife.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_8
StringTable.String: Your refusal invites more chaos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This burden of choice is yours.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_9
StringTable.String: We presented a chance for harmony, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you have opted for discord. The repercussions are now yours to deal with.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option1_10
StringTable.String: Our hopes for peace are dashed by your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You must shoulder the responsibility for the coming conflict.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option1_0
StringTable.String: What brings you this way, alien?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Be quick, our time is valuable.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Since you already have ships trespassing through our sphere of influence, I guess it makes sense you'd drop by in person.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Now that that whole war business is behind us, let's have a more productive relationship, yes?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option6_0
StringTable.String: Have you come to gloat?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option6_1
StringTable.String: This war has not gone as we had hoped.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option7_0
StringTable.String: The time for groveling has arrived.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option7_1
StringTable.String: I look forward to your pleading.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option10_0
StringTable.String: Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_1
StringTable.String: Were you aware that every Altarian can recite the cosmic laws by the age of three? Such basic knowledge, but we understand it might be advanced for others.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_2
StringTable.String: Did you know Altarians meditate in binary? It's a simple exercise in cognitive superiority. We're sure you'll get there one day.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_3
StringTable.String: Are you aware that our society has eliminated the concept of waste? Every object serves a multitude of purposes in its lifecycle. Such elegance might seem alien to you, quite understandably.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_4
StringTable.String: Do you know that we Altarians have solved all known paradoxes of quantum physics over our afternoon tea? It is a delightful diversion. Do try it some time, if you can.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option12_5
StringTable.String: Did you know that every single Altarian composes an original symphony as a rite of passage? We understand if this concept is foreign to you. After all, harmonizing the cosmic vibrations is no trivial task for the uninitiated.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option13_0
StringTable.String: Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. Flap whatever it is you use to communicate.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option14_0
StringTable.String: We trust you no more than we have to.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option16_0
StringTable.String: Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option17_0
StringTable.String: You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option18_0
StringTable.String: We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option19_0
StringTable.String: We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option20_0
StringTable.String: How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option21_0
StringTable.String: It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option22_0
StringTable.String: You will find us loyal friends, and dangerous enemies. Be careful which you choose.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option23_0
StringTable.String: Your communication is a pleasant surprise. What can we discuss today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option24_0
StringTable.String: We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option25_0
StringTable.String: We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option26_0
StringTable.String: Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option27_0
StringTable.String: What can we do for you today, human?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option28_0
StringTable.String: It is a pleasure to see you, little human.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option29_0
StringTable.String: Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option30_0
StringTable.String: Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option31_0
StringTable.String: We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option32_0
StringTable.String: What is it you want today, fleshling?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option33_0
StringTable.String: What do the land loving humans want today?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option34_0
StringTable.String: No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option35_0
StringTable.String: Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option36_0
StringTable.String: Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option1_2
StringTable.String: Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option1_3
StringTable.String: The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_DOGPILE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_DOGPILE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_APOCALYPSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_APOCALYPSE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Very well, let's trade.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option1_1
StringTable.String: This is acceptable.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option1_2
StringTable.String: Agreed.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option1_3
StringTable.String: This works.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We humbly accept your terms.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option2_1
StringTable.String: We are grateful to your mercy.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: You may now live on your knees.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_1
StringTable.String: You are fortunate we are feeling merciful today.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_2
StringTable.String: We accept your offer, more out of generosity than need.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_3
StringTable.String: Your survival is our gift; remember this mercy.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_4
StringTable.String: Consider this peace a testament to our benevolence.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_5
StringTable.String: You live, not by strength, but by our grace.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_6
StringTable.String: Today, mercy prevails over might. Cherish this peace.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_7
StringTable.String: Let it be known, our forgiveness is your salvation.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_8
StringTable.String: Accept this peace as an olive branch, not a sign of weakness.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_9
StringTable.String: Our might remains unchallenged, but we choose peace.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option3_10
StringTable.String: We grant you peace, a favor you should not forget.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We agree to these terms.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We humbly agree to these terms.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We are grateful for your mercy and agree to these terms.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option7_0
StringTable.String: You are very persuasive, let's trade.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We accept your offer, but we will remember this next time.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Agreed, let us bind the terms in stone.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option10_0
StringTable.String: This trade proposition may serve to further our dominance.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option11_0
StringTable.String: There is high probability of mutual benefit.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: This offer is not acceptable.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: No.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option1_2
StringTable.String: This won't work for me

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option1_3
StringTable.String: We need more.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: I wouldn't give you pebbles for this.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option5_0
StringTable.String: I laugh at your offer.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option6_0
StringTable.String: Do you take us for fools? Try harder.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option7_0
StringTable.String: This offer makes me sad.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option8_0
StringTable.String: I don't like this offer.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Unacceptable.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option10_0
StringTable.String: A pitiful excuse for an offer.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option11_0
StringTable.String: If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option12_0
StringTable.String: I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option13_0
StringTable.String: Your offer is contemptible.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option14_0
StringTable.String: This offer does not fit our parameters.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option15_0
StringTable.String: This offer offends our ancestors.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option16_0
StringTable.String: You think yourself clever for this offer?

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option17_0
StringTable.String: This offer is quite dull.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option1_0
StringTable.String: I'm glad we could come to an agreement.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option1_1
StringTable.String: This was a good day.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option1_2
StringTable.String: May this prosperous exchange unite our civilizations.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Here's to our mutual success.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option2_0
StringTable.String: A crystalized agreement brings me content.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Perfect, I'll have my servants see to it.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Post-execution analysis indicates a successful exchange.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option5_0
StringTable.String: I am glad we could come to an agreement.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We are pleased with this result.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option7_0
StringTable.String: This agreement furthers our plans.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Hooray. We are so happy!

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option9_0
StringTable.String: This is acceptable.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We toast you for a successful negotiation.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Our agreement is concluded.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option12_0
StringTable.String: You may live. For now.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option13_0
StringTable.String: You have our respect.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option14_0
StringTable.String: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option15_0
StringTable.String: This will work for us. For now.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option16_0
StringTable.String: We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We compute that this is an equitable agreement.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option18_0
StringTable.String: Thank you for this.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option19_0
StringTable.String: Our business is concluded.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option20_0
StringTable.String: The Way has been served.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option21_0
StringTable.String: It is a pleasure doing business with you.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option22_0
StringTable.String: Thank you for offering us your better deal.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option23_0
StringTable.String: What a bright trade! Approved.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option0_0
StringTable.String: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option1_0
StringTable.String: What do you have in mind?

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option1_1
StringTable.String: I am interested in seeing your proposal.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option1_2
StringTable.String: Let us see what you propose.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Present your proposal.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Let us come to terms.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Our mineral forms remain steadfast and patient, we anticipate the presentation of your trade proposition.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Present an offer worthy of our superior civilization.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Currently awaiting input of trade proposition parameters.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are interested in trading this with you.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We have come to negotiate a trade.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We have come to negotiate terms to end this war.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are here to discuss terms for peace.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option7_0
StringTable.String: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option9_1
StringTable.String: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option9_2
StringTable.String: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option9_3
StringTable.String: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, fleshling.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option9_4
StringTable.String: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option13_0
StringTable.String: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option14_0
StringTable.String: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option16_0
StringTable.String: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option18_0
StringTable.String: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option19_0
StringTable.String: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option20_0
StringTable.String: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Let this trade deepen our alliance and benefit us both.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_TRADE_COUNTER_OFFER_HEADER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are looking to negotiate a deal.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_TRADE_COUNTER_OFFER_HEADER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are considering this trade.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are interested in trading this with you.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option1_1
StringTable.String: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option1_2
StringTable.String: Consider our offer.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Take a look at this trade opportunity.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We are really excited to make this offer to you. Our gills are literally filled with delight. Or bacteria. It could definitely be bacteria now that I think of it.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option2_1
StringTable.String: We're just bursting with anticipation! Or it's the pressure from being this deep. No, it's definitely anticipation!

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option2_2
StringTable.String: We offer you the pearls of our wisdom and trade, encased in oysters of friendship. Just don't ask where the oysters came from.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option2_3
StringTable.String: Welcome to our ocean of possibilities. We hope you don't mind if we dive right into negotiations. Or if we suddenly start singing. It's mating season, you see. You probably didn't need to know that.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option2_4
StringTable.String: We're fresh out of the Drengin pain amplifiers and ready to negotiate a good deal. What do you think of this trade?

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option6_0
StringTable.String: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option7_0
StringTable.String: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_1
StringTable.String: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_2
StringTable.String: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_3
StringTable.String: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, worm.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_4
StringTable.String: We've momentarily grown tired of conquest. Let's play this quaint game of trade you seem so fond of.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option9_5
StringTable.String: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_1
StringTable.String: Ascend the lowly stairs of your understanding through trade with us. We merely ask for a trinket in return, something you may manage to comprehend.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_2
StringTable.String: Bask in the glory of our celestial wisdom in this trade. Surely even you can see the value in our divine offer, despite your obvious limitations.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_3
StringTable.String: The divine paths have crossed, hinting at an exchange between us. We request only the most basic of your goods, for anything complex might be beyond your grasp.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_4
StringTable.String: Even in our infinite grandeur, we stoop to enlighten you through trade. You should be overwhelmed by gratitude, for such benevolence is rare in the cosmos.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option10_5
StringTable.String: We permit you a glimpse of our radiant wisdom. Accept our trade offer, for even the dullest of stones can catch a glimmer of light, wouldn't you agree?

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option11_1
StringTable.String: If you think this offer isn't a fair deal then you aren't seeing the big picture. We've already hacked your communications array and know that you think that we are some sort of primitive AI that can't assemble a good offer. I can assure you, this is a good deal. Take it.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option13_0
StringTable.String: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option14_0
StringTable.String: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option15_0
StringTable.String: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option16_0
StringTable.String: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option18_0
StringTable.String: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option19_0
StringTable.String: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option20_0
StringTable.String: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_SPECIFIC_VALUABLE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Here is what we had in mind: {TRADEGOOD:0}.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Consider this a gift because this is the most mercy we are willing to show.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We hope that this offer is worthy of your mighty consideration.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option1_1
StringTable.String: We hope our humble offer is worthy of your gracious and benevolent and merciful consideration.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option2_0
StringTable.String: In addition we are including some other items for your consideration.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option2_1
StringTable.String: As you can see we have added other items to the mix.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I don't know what you're saying, but it's probably hostile. Prepare for war!

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The time has come to destroy you.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_Option1_1
StringTable.String: It is time for you to die.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_ATTEMPT_PEACE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: This war is tiring. I wish we could work past our differences... (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_ATTEMPT_PEACE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Let's negotiate a peace treaty.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_ATTEMPT_PEACE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Let's come to terms.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Let gelomoh elurecus ela!

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Very well, consider us at war.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Then it is war.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_Option1_2
StringTable.String: So be it. War it is.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We aren't interested in talking to you.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option1_1
StringTable.String: We're not interested in hearing your groveling.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option1_2
StringTable.String: We have no interest in hearing your cries for mercy.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_DONE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I guess you don't feel like talking.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_DONE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Goodbye.

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_DONE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Farewell.

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Blar bagh?!

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_RESPONSE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: You will regret this.

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_RESPONSE_Option1_1
StringTable.String: You have chosen death.

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CONFIRM_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Yeah, you heard me! Also, you sound dumb!

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CONFIRM_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Yeah, you heard me!

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CANCEL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Sorry, just kidding. You couldn't understand me... right?

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CANCEL_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Nevermind.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Our time is precious, but we are always interested in working with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} under the right circumstances.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We are very busy but we always have time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are very hungry. Very, very hungry. If you are wasting our time, you will need to compensate us with the only currency you have.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We are busy exploring the universe but we can spare a little time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Being this cute takes a lot of time but then again what's the point of being cute if you can't spend a little time talking to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option6_0
StringTable.String: What more would you like to discuss with me?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Be brief or be dead.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option8_0
StringTable.String: What can we do for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} today?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Enter input.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option10_0
StringTable.String: What additional topics would you like to talk about?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option11_0
StringTable.String: What else do you need?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Are you ready to be saved now?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option13_0
StringTable.String: What else can there be to discuss?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option14_0
StringTable.String: You are testing our patience!

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option15_0
StringTable.String: What other topic that might be profitable would you like to discuss?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option16_0
StringTable.String: Speak.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option17_0
StringTable.String: We have the patience of the great grove. But our patience isn't endless.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option18_0
StringTable.String: Sound is a crude form of communication, but it is all you have.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option19_0
StringTable.String: Is there more we can discuss today -be it for business or leisure?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We would like to publicly proclaim our never ending friendship for you.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Remove your ships from our territory immediately.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The cost of policing space is not trivial. We would like you to contribute to help cover our expenses.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_ASK_FOR_HELP_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_ASK_FOR_HELP_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We require financial help. Please give it to us.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We would like to offer you financial aid, with the hope that it will strengthen our relationship.

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_CANCEL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_CANCEL_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps some other time.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We accept your expression of friendship with the value it is worth.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_PROCLAIM_FRIENDSHIP_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We hope our relationship will grow even closer in the future.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}, we are sorry that our ships have made you nervous. We will ask them to leave your territories immediately.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_REJECT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}, it is a very large galaxy. We cannot afford to waste time avoiding your territory because you are paranoid. Our ships will continue their missions; we suggest you do not get in their way.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_GET_OFF_MY_LAWN_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: They had better be careful, or you will find yourself with a smaller fleet.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
