StringTable.String: THIS SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN (translator missing)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are willing to pay for security, for the time being. We have more important issues that require our attention. I do not recommend you push your luck any further.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: As long as you keep the credits coming, we will not have a problem.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_REJECT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We have no interest in paying you to leave us in peace. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} will not forget this attempted extortion. You will regret it if you continue to pester us.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_DEMAND_TRIBUTE_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: OK, but don't blame us if one of your ships should have an 'accident'.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has been a friend to us in the past. We are willing to help you in your time of need.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have struggled with technological progress recently, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you please share the knowledge of {TECHNAME:2} with us?

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: We are great admirers of your technological capabilities. Would you be willing to share {TECHNAME:2} with us?

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: No matter how much we torture our slaves, they cannot seem to grasp {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: The gods have not seen fit to give us the secret of {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are always willing to help a friend.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Very well, we are glad to help.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We won't forget this. Thank you.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: This will help our people immensely.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_2
StringTable.String: Thank you for your help.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_3
StringTable.String: Your willingness to share with us is truly appreciated.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: This knowledge is too dangerous to share.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are suffering an economic setback, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you be willing to give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help us?

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: We are finding our treasury stretched thin due to recent internal... incidents. We would appreciate it if you could give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help fund this year's budget.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The people of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} need money to help the war effort, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please support us with {AMOUNT:2} credits to help pay for it.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: I won't lie to you, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} really like money. A lot. We dream of it. We sleep with it. We...well, we do a lot of things with it. And we need more. A lot more. It would help our relations if you gave us {AMOUNT:2} credits.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Our ongoing research is expensive, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} is asking you for {AMOUNT:2} credits so that we can continue to invest in new technology. Doing so will benefit our relationship.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_MAIN_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We are wary of outsiders, {LEADERNAME:2}. However, the people of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} find themselves struggling a little bit. If you could provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits it would strengthen our bond.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are always willing to help. Well, not always but at least this time.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We appreciate your help.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Thank you.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_2
StringTable.String: We will not forget this act of generosity.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We don't have enough money to help you.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ENEMY_TOO_POWERFUL_Option0_0
StringTable.String: They are far too powerful.

StringTable.Label: IHaveEnoughOfThatResource_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We have enough of that resource.

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_GenericConfirm_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Understood

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_StartOfGame_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Since the inception of the Hyperdrive by the Terran Alliance, this groundbreaking technology has rapidly spread, ushering in a multitude of new civilizations onto the galactic forefront. [BR][BR]We categorize minor civilizations as those yet to achieve Faster-Than-Light travel. Notably, a species named the Xeloxi recently pilfered Hyperdrive blueprints from unsuspecting researchers who visited their domain. [BR][BR]The Xeloxi's societal norms starkly contrast with our understanding of morality. Activities we deem criminal, including theft, are integral to their culture. Consequently, they have emerged as a formidable threat in our vicinity, predominantly exploiting vulnerable civilizations without the means to resist. [BR][BR]Our primary mission is to shield these civilizations. To achieve this, we must integrate them into our sphere of influence. Establishing a Starbase in proximity and expanding its influence is our best strategy. Simultaneously, efforts to oust the Xeloxi from this sector must be intensified. Good luck!

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_ControlsMinorCivxXeloxiRemain_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. This freedom may be temporary. There is a threat as long as the Xeloxi occupy this part of the galaxy. The Xeloxi must be pushed from the sector, and any planet they claim retaken.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_ControlsMinorCivxXeloxiDestroyed_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. In addition, the Xeloxi have already been pushed from this part of the galaxy, providing additional security to these fledgling civilizations.[BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_XeloxiDestroyedMinorFactionsUncontrolled_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations of this sector may not feel relief yet. They remain unprotected and may still suffer from the Xeloxi influence. To stabilize this section of the galaxy, the Minor Civilizations should be brought under the Alliance's Zone of Control.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_XeloxiDestroyedMinorFactionsControlled_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations can know true peace, at least for a moment. They are now under Alliance protection, and the Xeloxi threat has been sent far away.BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_DestroyedMinorFaction_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Abort![BR][BR]Something must have gone wrong. One of the Minor Civilizations has been destroyed. Things have escalated too far. The lives that remain can not be risked.[BR][BR]This mission is being counted as failed, and the Alliance is pulling all resources from the sector.[BR][BR]Failed Objective: Ensure All Minor Factions Survive

StringTable.Label: BraveNewUniverse_StartOfGame_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We have received vital intelligence regarding the discovery of Subspace Streams. These streams allow ships to traverse instantly between different galactic sectors. This represents both an unprecedented opportunity and a considerable threat. [BR][BR] The influx of various civilizations into our space region necessitates prudence and diplomacy. Your foremost task is reminiscent of our previous challenge: to forge a coalition akin to the one we established during the Dread Lord crisis years past. [BR][BR] Establishing alliances will undoubtedly pose challenges, but we are not without resources and strategies. Trade negotiations, stationing seasoned diplomats, and researching advanced diplomatic techniques will be invaluable. It is imperative that you strive to form solid alliances with these emerging civilizations.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option10_0
StringTable.String: If there is a way to save you we will find it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option190_0
StringTable.String: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our experiments have gone awry. It has control now. There is nothing to be done but die. [BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:2} must be destroyed.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option11_0
StringTable.String: We will not be erased.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option191_0
StringTable.String: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. We have come here from an alternate future where the {PLAYERFACTION:2} have destroyed the universe itself.[BR][BR]You must be stopped. Prepare yourselves for destruction.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option12_0
StringTable.String: You should go back to your tree, rodent.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option192_0
StringTable.String: Your doom is at hand. We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. [BR][BR]We will rid the galaxy of all sub-Sciuridae filth.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option13_0
StringTable.String: You should have stayed dead.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option193_0
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](A scrambled transmission arrives)[/COLOR][BR][BR]The galaxy thought we were dead. You will soon learn how wrong they were. Prepare for death.

StringTable.Label: EverythingIsForSale_StartOfGame_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Welcome valued customer, or should I say... future member of someone’s prized collection? We’re over the moons to have you here.[BR][BR]You see, this sector, it's like a bountiful farmer’s market on a Sunday morning. If you replace fruits with business associates, that is. It's teeming with opportunities, and contrary to popular belief, we, the Corporate Sector, aren’t just about the Iridia Corporation's bottom line. Heavens, no! We cherish every resource, every individual, and yes, every organ as if they were our own flesh and blood. Well, perhaps not our own, but certainly someone’s – ideally someone who won’t notice when one goes missing. After all, the open market operates on love. And nothing says love quite like trading in someone's pancreas, right? Now, gaze upon this vastness of this sector. It's not just big; it's really, truly, hugely... big. And we have set our hearts, and also our strategic expansion teams, on bringing every nook and cranny of it under the vast umbrella of our influence. And fear not! We're not about lasers and death stars. We’re more into the subtle art of interstellar marketing. Our tool of choice? The majestic Communication Starbase, broadcasting irresistible deals galaxy-wide, available at our emporiums. Think of them as celestial billboards, if billboards could also hold cocktail parties and attract alien influencers. And now, let me introduce your shiny new title: Senior Junior Associate Vice President of Corporate Affairs for this sector. Sound grand? It is. Your mission, should you choose to accept it (and we highly recommend you do), is to spread our delightful influence everywhere. But tread lightly. We wouldn’t want to rub potential customers the wrong way, especially if they have a fleet of warships. So, venture forth, learn the ropes, construct those Starbases, and remember: if you don’t perform up to par, you'll be reassigned. As a customer. And between you and me, I've heard you have some prime organs that would fetch a pretty pintar. But let’s not jump ahead. Best of luck, and may the Corporation be inside you!

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Tallas orda cullan bana. (You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: As you probably suspect, we will soon be laying our eggs inside your flesh.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We have heard you refer to the Arnor and Dread Lords as the Precursors. We were the first to discover the subspace streams that connect different parts of the galaxy together.[BR][BR]What is not commonly known is that we didn't invent any sort of technology for this per se. They are not an invention but rather a discovery.[BR][BR]The subspace streams are, in fact, a natural phenomenon of the universe. For all we know, there are streams that reach other galaxies entirely.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option2_1
StringTable.String: There are far stranger oddities in the universe than the subspace streams. For instance, there are dimensional gates that travel between different universes entirely.[BR][BR]We once encountered a species from another universe known as the Arilou who came from a universe with its own storied history.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option2_2
StringTable.String: Long after the Precursors disappeared we were satisfied with simply exploring the universe to find the next great wonder.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, there are far worse things in the universe than the species you refer to as the Dread Lords. [BR][BR]The ancient creators, known as the Mithrilar, had experimented on many types of creations before they made the Precursors and not all of those things are gone and some, I am afraid to say, are now awakened.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Long ago, on our world, there were five other sentient species. I suppose you could call them 'Sapient' but who am I to play games with semantics. In any case, we were the only ones to survive.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option4_0
StringTable.String: For us, self-interest is the highest form of morality. You can know, with absolute certainty, that we will be your most loyal friend if it is in our self-interest for you to survive.[BR][BR]Of course, conversely, if it is in our self-interest for you to die, you can be equally assured that you will die.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option5_0
StringTable.String: It has been lost to history but it was our civilization that invented the stargates. [BR][BR]Over two hundred thousand years we invested trillions into the construction of a vast network of stargates.[BR][BR]The stargates allowed ships to travel Hyperspace level 2 between any two of them. This cut down the travel time of a ship traveling 10 lightyears down to only a little over 3 years.[BR][BR]Of course, the proliferation of the Hyperdrive technology allowed individual ships to travel much faster making our efforts obsolete. But for tens of thousands of years, this part of the galaxy was ours.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option6_0
StringTable.String: The other civilizations have not come to the realization that the universe is not only finite but only a small fraction will ever be reachable. [BR][BR]Make no mistake, this galaxy is all we will ever reach.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Our world was called 'Elemental' by the Precursors during their height. [BR][BR]The first off-world proxy war between the two Precursor factions that we called the Dred'nir and Elas'nir was fought on the surface of our planet long before the other species of the galaxy even evolved into their modern form. Yes, that even includes the humans.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We may not exterminate your kind in the immediate future. But eventually there will be a reckoning.[BR][BR]We have made the calculations. The great void sometimes called Bootes void is simply the result of billions of years of Dyson sphere construction hiding the light of countless galaxies. The civilization at the center of that void has already had their singularity.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Our civilization was once a peaceful, preindustrial, aquatic paradise. Then the Drengin came.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We were aware of space travel for centuries. How could we help but not know when raiders were perpetually coming down from the heavens and stealing our offspring?[BR][BR]It was fortunate for us when one of their ships failed to escape the surface of our planet and we learned their secrets.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option11_0
StringTable.String: We do not seek to destroy the Yor simply because they stole our home world. [BR][BR]Contrary to some reports, we did not actually create the Yor. The Precursors ordered us to make them, but the actual spark of life that the Yor have did not come from us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option12_0
StringTable.String: In a galaxy with such varied species, it is easy to simply stereotype different civilizations based on their most obvious traits. [BR][BR]We are treated like we are greedy. But this isn't true. Our ideology is opportunity. When we trade, we are creating a better universe for our customers as well as for ourselves.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option13_0
StringTable.String: We are not explorers by choice but by necessity.[BR][BR]There is something actively absorbing the life force from all worlds. That is why you find so many dead planets. These worlds weren't always dead.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option14_0
StringTable.String: We look forward to rejoining Earth. But while Earth was trapped behind a Precursor shield for years, our fleet was trapped in a pocket universe of the Precursors making.[BR][BR]We saw things in that pocket universe that we cannot unsee. It wasn't just the Orb of Draginol, the so-called Bane weapon, that came out of that pocket universe with us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option15_0
StringTable.String: A well informed galaxy is a peaceful galaxy. If you want to know things about others, seek us out.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option16_0
StringTable.String: While we are certainly physically capable of physically crushing any other species, we do our best to avoid actual direct physical violence.[BR][BR]Our kind can only reproduce on our original home world that is now lost to us. While we are long lived, we are not immortal nor are indestructible.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option17_0
StringTable.String: There is a misunderstanding that THE WAY is a religion based on faith. It is not. [BR][BR]We are a collection of species that have had direct, physical contact with a being of such immense glory, whose plan for the universe is so sublime, that we feel obligated to bring others into this holy cause.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option18_0
StringTable.String: The time is coming where we civilizations with the same philosophy must unite together to destroy those who would stand against us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option18_1
StringTable.String: Soon, {LEADERNAME:2}, the galaxy will unite one way or the other.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option19_0
StringTable.String: We are pleased with the ideological path you have chosen thus far. Benevolence is the path of the righteous.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option19_1
StringTable.String: Resisting the temptation of evil is not always easy. But it will help us all build a better galaxy.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option19_2
StringTable.String: The universe is dark enough without adding to it, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are pleased with the path you have taken so far.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option20_0
StringTable.String: You impress us, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your understanding that the weak are fodder for the strong has won you respect with us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option20_1
StringTable.String: Is it kinder to allow the weak to continue to suffer a state of existence? Or to end their pain by exterminating them? Based on your actions, {LEADERNAME:2}, it would seem you agree with us. The weak must be exterminated.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option21_0
StringTable.String: What, exactly, are you supposed to be? Some sort of rock-based worm species?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option21_1
StringTable.String: It is hard to believe that a silicon-based life form naturally evolved. Are you sure you are natural?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option22_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} should have stayed in the sewers of their home world, {LEADERNAME:2}. There is very little water in space.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option22_1
StringTable.String: The vacuum of space is no place for the likes of you, {LEADERNAME:2} . You should return to the oceans of your home world.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option23_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} and {PLAYERFACTION:1} will crush our mutual enemies together! We look forward to torturing them and their pets!

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option24_0
StringTable.String: It is a shame we find ourselves in a time of galactic war. But with you fighting our mutual enemy we believe victory is certain.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option25_0
StringTable.String: Be careful who you trade with, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our people have no tolerance for those who affiliate themselves with evil.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option26_0
StringTable.String: The advantage you may have gained by declaring war early will cost you far more in good will, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option27_0
StringTable.String: Your civilization makes me ill. The evil and immorality that you are spreading across the universe makes us dream for your demise.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option27_1
StringTable.String: Your evil civilization will eventually suffer the fate of all civilizations that lack of a moral code.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option27_2
StringTable.String: It saddens us that your civilization continues to exist. We look forward to the day your species goes extinct from the universe.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option27_3
StringTable.String: Your civilization has chosen a poor ethical route. We can only hope that in time, you suffer the fate of all evil empires.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option28_0
StringTable.String: You think your power is impressive? Your civilization thrives only because it has always taken the quick and easy path.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option28_1
StringTable.String: Despite your power, we continue to see you as inferiors due to your moral choices.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option28_2
StringTable.String: The corruption within the heart of your civilization has given you a temporary benefit in power. But eventually, your civilization will crumble and we will be there to laugh.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option29_0
StringTable.String: You are are war with our ally, {LEADERNAME:2}. Find a way to make peace or pay the consequences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option30_0
StringTable.String: Our people admire your vast power, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option31_0
StringTable.String: I cannot believe I'm talking to animated meat. How do you function?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option31_1
StringTable.String: I just want to understand. You communicate by pushing air through a piece of meat that is located in a hole that you call your "mouth"?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option31_2
StringTable.String: We continue to be astounded that you creatures exist. You're basically a sack of goo. How are you even created?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option32_0
StringTable.String: Seriously? Are you brazenly going to try to incite our people to rebel right in front of us?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option32_1
StringTable.String: If you don't quit trying to culturally subjugate my people, we will be forced to declare war.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option32_2
StringTable.String: Your communication starbases are spreading your ugly culture too close to our worlds. Remove them.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option32_3
StringTable.String: We do not appreciate your communication starbases so close to our planets.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option32_4
StringTable.String: Your communication starbase is so close to our worlds that we are picking up your obnoxious entertainment.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option33_0
StringTable.String: My daughter came by and told me about the amazing ways of your people. I asked her how had she heard about it and that's when I learned that you have a Cultural starbase inside our area of influence! Get rid of it.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option33_1
StringTable.String: You seriously think you can culturally dominate humans? We have chocolate!

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option34_0
StringTable.String: Your vile culture offends us. Remove your ridiculous starbases from our sphere of influence immediately.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option34_1
StringTable.String: Your culture is no match for Torian Fire Chili.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option35_0
StringTable.String: Our people have resisted Titans, Sorcerer Kings, and Fallen Enchantresses. We will resist your deplorable culture.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option35_1
StringTable.String: Our world is literally magical. Do you really think they will want to join you?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option36_0
StringTable.String: Stop trying to brainwash our people into following your vile culture immediately.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option36_1
StringTable.String: Our people are deeply spiritual. We will not continue to tolerate your cultural attacks on us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option37_0
StringTable.String: You are wasting your time. Our people cannot be culturally assimilated.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option37_1
StringTable.String: As non-biologics, we have no need for your culture. We are immune to it. Our worlds will never rebel.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option38_0
StringTable.String: We have no interest in your culture. Did you think we wouldn't notice your starbase right next to our planets?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option38_1
StringTable.String: We already had to flee one world, we do not intend to be subjugated to an alien culture. Remove your starbases.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option39_0
StringTable.String: Be wary who you trade with. If you want to be our friend, do not trade with those who have despicable ideologies.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option39_1
StringTable.String: You should be aware that you are trading with a civilization whose culture represents everything we are against.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option40_0
StringTable.String:
We are getting a lot of reports from our people regarding the ease of working with your people.
The open borders treaty that exists between our peoples has greatly improved commerce and relations between our citizens and yours.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option40_1
StringTable.String: The open borders treaty has made navigation in this sector much easier. Thank you.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option41_0
StringTable.String: Soon, your worlds will be ours.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option41_1
StringTable.String: If you surrender now, we will show mercy.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option42_0
StringTable.String: Your planets are ripe for conquest. Even now, my military advisors are urging me to take action.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option42_1
StringTable.String: Your military is so weak that it is a miracle you haven't already been conquered.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option43_0
StringTable.String: As much as we love capitalism, we do not appreciate you intentionally trying to incite our people to join you. Remove your starbases, or else.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option44_0
StringTable.String: Our mutual trade continues to strengthen our relationship.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option44_1
StringTable.String: We are finding that our trading relationship is building a sense of trust between our people.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option45_0
StringTable.String: Our shared borders are making my advisors irritable. Make sure you stay on your side.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option45_1
StringTable.String: We admit we don't respect your borders. Perhaps it's time for an open borders treaty?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option45_2
StringTable.String: There is tension due to our close borders. An open borders treaty would alleviate this.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option46_0
StringTable.String: You should be aware that our military is quite annoyed with your starbase. You should negotiate an open borders treaty with us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option47_0
StringTable.String: While we do not plan to attack your ships that trespass, be aware that they cause us some consternation. If you want to travel through our zone of influence, negotiate an open borders treaty.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option48_0
StringTable.String: We have concerns about your armed ships traveling near our worlds without an open borders treaty.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option48_1
StringTable.String: If you want to maintain good relations with us, then don't send armed ships into our space without an open borders treaty.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option48_2
StringTable.String: We do not appreciate having military vessels traveling into our space without a treaty.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option49_0
StringTable.String: Our ultimate goal is to conquer the galaxy. When we ultimately consume you, we want you to know that it wasn't personal.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option49_1
StringTable.String: Our people desire for galactic conquest.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option50_0
StringTable.String: You colonized a planet within our zone of influence. We won't necessarily go to war over that, but don't be surprised if the people of that world ultimately decide to join us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option51_0
StringTable.String: What exactly is your long-term plan? My military advisors tell me that your civilization would be safer under our rule, given your lack of military power.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option51_1
StringTable.String: Have you considered giving your worlds to us? Your people would be much safer under our protection.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option51_2
StringTable.String: Your lack of military power is making you an easy target for would-be conquerors.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option52_0
StringTable.String: Your worlds...so poorly defended. So ripe for conquest.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option52_1
StringTable.String: We appreciate your pacifism. It will make your eventual conquest that much easier.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option52_2
StringTable.String: You have no idea how fortunate you are that we are busy with other things. Your pitiful military and rich worlds are calling to us. Do you understand?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option53_0
StringTable.String: Your people are calling upon us to learn the proper way to live.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option53_1
StringTable.String: There is so much blasphemy on your worlds. It may soon be time to bring a proper moral order to them.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option53_2
StringTable.String: Your people call out for redemption from their sins. We may be the instrument of their salvation.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option54_0
StringTable.String: Your worlds are full of beings ripe for the feeding. You are like cattle waiting to be slaughtered.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option54_1
StringTable.String: Your planets are so tempting to us. Our shock troops can be a bit sadistic, but in time, I suspect you will come to appreciate them.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option54_2
StringTable.String: Your planets are ripe for the taking. Traditionally, we flay our victims alive, but if you wish to turn over your worlds over to us voluntarily, we will... well, let's be serious. We'll still flay you alive.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_MAIN_Option55_0
StringTable.String: The Universe is a dance of energy, infinite and eternal. Life is a song that blends in perfect harmony.

StringTable.Label: REBEL_CIV_NAMES_Option0_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME} Republic

StringTable.Label: REBEL_CIV_NAMES_Option0_1
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} Empire

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Raised in the derelict shells of old manufacturing satellites.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Practiced as a vat-grown food chef, dreams of opening a zero-gravity diner.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_2
StringTable.String: Deconditioned after being indoctrinated by a virtual reality zealot sect.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_3
StringTable.String: Developed space phobia from a childhood spent in cramped asteroid colonies.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_4
StringTable.String: Loyal only to their faction within the Martian Syndicate, isolated from others.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_5
StringTable.String: Dropped out of neural surgery program. Now avoids neural interface discussions.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_6
StringTable.String: Escaped compulsory service in the Lunar Defense Corps using family's elite status.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_7
StringTable.String: Disinherited from a legacy of a renowned spacefaring lineage and deeply resentful.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_8
StringTable.String: Wields a plasma scar from a zero-g duel over a holographic paramour. Declared victory.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_9
StringTable.String: Lost olfactory sensors in a nanofactory mishap; now engineers scentless environments.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_10
StringTable.String: A descendant of a long-forgotten terrestrial dynasty now irrelevant in space politics.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_11
StringTable.String: Imbued with ancient wisdom after years with off-world monastic isolates.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_12
StringTable.String: Escaped from the underbelly of a sprawling spaceport, once a haven for smugglers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_13
StringTable.String: Nomadic childhood in a military family, adapted to the diverse cultures of starbases.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_14
StringTable.String: Ex-solar sailor, accustomed to the solitude of the vast interstellar oceans.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_15
StringTable.String: Astute space envoy, entrenched in the nuances of intergalactic diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_16
StringTable.String: Triumphed over a nano-drug dependency, became an advocate for neural health.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_17
StringTable.String: Survivor of a cryogenic accident on an ice moon, lost digits to the void's chill.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_18
StringTable.String: An exosuit engineer with an obsessive eye, endlessly tinkering with microadjustments.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_19
StringTable.String: Bares the marks of a youthful mishap with a malfunctioning food replicator.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_20
StringTable.String: Adopts the appearance of a late clone sibling, preserving their visage against time.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_21
StringTable.String: Ever-flipping a piece of enigmatic extraterrestrial currency, claiming it decides fate.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_22
StringTable.String: Enforcer of linguistic protocols, resorts to shock prods for grammatical infractions.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_23
StringTable.String: Possesses an unwaveringly dry wit, often mistaken for a malfunctioning translation unit.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_24
StringTable.String: Heeds twin AIs whispering strategies, providence housed in their neural implants.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_25
StringTable.String: Unwittingly partook in consumption of cloned tissue; now navigates complex dietary ethics.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_26
StringTable.String: Archivist supreme, skilled in curating data relics from obliterated networks.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_27
StringTable.String: Plagued by enigmatic warnings from an anonymous source, possibly an ancient AI.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_28
StringTable.String: Experiences a clash of senses when interfacing with alien communication channels.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_29
StringTable.String: Battles a stutter, amplified when directing fleets via quantum comms.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_30
StringTable.String: Lone graduate from a failed experimental strategy program, associates with shadows.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_31
StringTable.String: Dreads mirrors after an encounter with a sentient and malevolent reflective anomaly.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_32
StringTable.String: Survived a skirmish with an unknowable cosmic entity; now a dedicated xenohunter.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_33
StringTable.String: Clad in tradition, adheres to personal codes of conduct from a long-lost civilization.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_34
StringTable.String: Compels genetic lineage investigations, hunts through DNA for traces of historic greatness.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_35
StringTable.String: Vehemently professes to be the echo of a venerated general from Earth's antiquity.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_36
StringTable.String: Demands flawless execution of duties, a product of the unforgiving void's discipline.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_37
StringTable.String: Grown amidst ancient servers, perceived the classics as cosmic signals guiding destiny.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_38
StringTable.String: Once a backup dancer for a now-forgotten pop star, seeks to revive the ancient choreography.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_39
StringTable.String: Won a minor fortune on a game show but invested it all in obsolete technology.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_40
StringTable.String: Believes they can communicate with plants, runs an underground botanist club.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_41
StringTable.String: Worked as a stunt double in low-budget historical simulations.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_42
StringTable.String: Has a pet rock collection, each named after famous generals and politicians.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_43
StringTable.String: Invented a language only spoken underwater, still searching for followers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_44
StringTable.String: Started a fashion trend by accident, now pretends it was on purpose.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_45
StringTable.String: Writes love letters to machines, convinced one will write back someday.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_46
StringTable.String: Obsessed with recreating the perfect cup of 21st-century coffee.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_47
StringTable.String: Claims to have been a pirate in a past life, has an uncanny knowledge of nautical history.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_48
StringTable.String: Lives on a diet solely of food printed from vintage recipes, insists it's the future of cuisine.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_49
StringTable.String: Teaches etiquette classes for rogue AI units in hiding.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_50
StringTable.String: Compulsive hoarder of old media, curates an illegal library in the asteroid belt.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_51
StringTable.String: Sells handmade gadgets that supposedly protect against alien telepathy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_52
StringTable.String: Ran for office as a joke, accidentally won, now a beloved public servant.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_53
StringTable.String: Survived a teleportation experiment gone wrong, now slightly out of phase with reality.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_54
StringTable.String: Former weather drone operator turned poet, captures storms in verse.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_55
StringTable.String: Famous for starting a cult that worships quantum entanglement as a form of divine connection.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option0_56
StringTable.String: Has a phobia of buttons, leads a campaign for zippers and touch clasps.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Has survived a hostile encounter with Irradiated lifeforms.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Has a cracked hand they can't use very much.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_2
StringTable.String: Telepathically shares emotions with others but struggles to read minds clearly.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_3
StringTable.String: Wrote a series of popular romance novels under a poorly maintained pseudonym.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_4
StringTable.String: Served on a commission that oversaw plans for the development of new weapons.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_5
StringTable.String: Once bypassed a rail gun's safety system to manually fire it in an emergency.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_6
StringTable.String: Is known to annoyingly sing telepathically to those around when focused on their work.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_7
StringTable.String: Spent millions exploring remote environments.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_8
StringTable.String: Pushes for social reform about using telepathy with non-telepathic entities.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_9
StringTable.String: Is undefeated in the Luxar Dominion's most popular social deception game.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_10
StringTable.String: Too patient for their own good.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_11
StringTable.String: Prone to lying despite the prevalence of telepathy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_12
StringTable.String: Is easily annoyed.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_13
StringTable.String: Paces whenever communicating telepathically.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option1_14
StringTable.String: Carries a packet of sand with them.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Sleeps with a flash crystal under their webbing.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_1
StringTable.String: Has never been formally charged with arson but is not allowed near accelerants.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_2
StringTable.String: Spends much of their free time meditating.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_3
StringTable.String: Rose to prominence through a cultist movement.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_4
StringTable.String: Keeps basic grammar rule reminders written on their wings.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_5
StringTable.String: Maintains strong connections to their childhood friends.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_6
StringTable.String: Discovered a minor improvement to a common engineering practice that has been widely adopted.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_7
StringTable.String: Hosts nectar parties once a week, but the time and place change frequently.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_8
StringTable.String: Is shorter than their peers, noticeably shorter.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_9
StringTable.String: Their prized possession is an old-world light crystal passed down from their grand sage.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_10
StringTable.String: Spent years as an anonymous music artist that wore a cover on their wings to all their gigs.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_11
StringTable.String: Spent their summers selling fireworks to larva.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_12
StringTable.String: Drinks far more nectar than their doctor recommends.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_13
StringTable.String: Struggles to maintain a standard schedule, staying up much longer than they sleep.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_14
StringTable.String: Eagerly celebrates each season change, no matter where they reside.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_15
StringTable.String: Constantly wonders if the good die young -why are they so old?

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_16
StringTable.String: Organizes nectar feast for their core team at least once a week.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_17
StringTable.String: Prefers old-world blade and powder over modern digital means of keeping notes.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_18
StringTable.String: Isn't allowed near filaments unless unsupervised.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option2_19
StringTable.String: Absolutely loathes synthetic fabrics.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Shuns the traditional molting slumber, declaring it a myth.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_1
StringTable.String: Boasts chitinous claws capable of a clacking typing tempest.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_2
StringTable.String: Adopted a new exoskeleton of secrecy within an enigmatic aquatic commando unit.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_3
StringTable.String: Was ejected from multiple esteemed reef academies for challenging the currents of conventional thought.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_4
StringTable.String: Assumed a new carapace of anonymity while toiling in the shadowy depths of a clandestine research trench.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option3_5
StringTable.String: Often orchestrates the swarm's tasks with meticulous pincer precision.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Endured the harsh existence under Drengin domination and lived to tell the tale.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_1
StringTable.String: Instinctively navigates to the nearest egress in any chamber, a habit from past escapes.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_2
StringTable.String: Devotes leisure cycles to uplifting the downtrodden through communal aid initiatives.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_3
StringTable.String: Bears a token of defiance, a necklace adorned with vanquished Drengin fangs.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_4
StringTable.String: Convenes a gathering of minds to ponder the universe's enigmas under Torian moons.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option4_5
StringTable.String: Pursues the preservation of ancient lore, breathing life into forgotten scripts.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Had an identical twin that went missing years ago.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option6_0
StringTable.String: Secretly maintains a list of names, several already crossed off it.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Is more concerned than most with the welfare of the poorest members of society.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option8_0
StringTable.String: Narrowly escaped an arranged marriage.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option9_0
StringTable.String: Has already made a fortune and lost it.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option10_0
StringTable.String: Body covered in scars they refuse to talk about.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option11_0
StringTable.String: Never seen without a mysterious brooch of unknown origin.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option12_0
StringTable.String: Grew up in the harsh environment of a destitute factory, raised by a community of squatters.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option13_0
StringTable.String: Once trained as a chef, dreams of opening their own restaurant.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option14_0
StringTable.String: Once a victim of a religious cult's brainwashing, they managed to escape and start anew.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option15_0
StringTable.String: Has a severe case of claustrophobia, making them dread the confined spaces of spaceships.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option16_0
StringTable.String: Has no friends or family outside of their political party.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option17_0
StringTable.String: Failed out of medical school and doesn't like talking about it.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option18_0
StringTable.String: Managed to avoid military service thanks to their influential family connections.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option19_0
StringTable.String: Once a rightful heir to a vast family fortune.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option20_0
StringTable.String: Bears the scar from a duel that was fought over the heart of a lover.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option21_0
StringTable.String: Lost their sense of smell in an industrial accident.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option22_0
StringTable.String: Has a lineage that traces back to minor nobility, bestowing a sense of pride and responsibility.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option23_0
StringTable.String: Gained wisdom and inner peace during their formative years at a remote Tibetan monastery.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option24_0
StringTable.String: Once a wharf rat in the slums of a bustling port city.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option25_0
StringTable.String: Had military parents and spent years moving around the solar system.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option26_0
StringTable.String: Years spent as a sailor have taught them to be resourceful and comfortable with solitude.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option27_0
StringTable.String: Spent their life perfecting the art of diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option28_0
StringTable.String: Once struggled with a crippling drug addiction, but has since overcome it and emerged stronger.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option29_0
StringTable.String: Lost two toes from frostbite in a mountaineering accident.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option30_0
StringTable.String: Once a skilled engineer, this leader has a habit of getting lost in the details.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option31_0
StringTable.String: Still bears the scars from a terrible cooking accident during childhood.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option32_0
StringTable.String: Grooms themselves to look identical to a long dead friend from their childhood..

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option33_0
StringTable.String: Always flipping a mysterious coin from an unknown alien civilization.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option34_0
StringTable.String: Forces proper grammar usage even if it means resorting to violence.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option35_0
StringTable.String: Struck it rich after discovering a rare mineral deposit on a desolate asteroid.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option36_0
StringTable.String: Once belonged to a secretive cult that worshipped a long-dead alien god.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option37_0
StringTable.String: Believes they are the reincarnation of a legendary hero, destined to accomplish great feats.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option38_0
StringTable.String: Unearthed the secrets of a long-lost alien library.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option39_0
StringTable.String: Once narrowly escaped death during a violent spaceship mutiny.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option40_0
StringTable.String: Born into a life of slavery and forced to fight for survival.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option41_0
StringTable.String: Once a renowned space explorer, this leader disappeared for years before mysteriously reappearing.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option42_0
StringTable.String: Claims to have come from a dystopian future and is on a mission to prevent it from ever occurring.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option43_0
StringTable.String: Insists the Precursors still walk among us in disguise.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option44_0
StringTable.String: Loves to sing, but has a dreadful sense of pitch, rhythm, and harmony.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option45_0
StringTable.String: Lost contact with their family.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option46_0
StringTable.String: Loves to assign humiliating pet names to their advisors.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option47_0
StringTable.String: Serves at the pleasure of a secret organization who could kill them at any moment.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option48_0
StringTable.String: Carries the skull of their former nemesis with them.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option49_0
StringTable.String: Spent decades under a vow of silence, communicating with no-one.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option50_0
StringTable.String: Was trapped on a colony ship adrift for many decades.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option51_0
StringTable.String: Diligently works every day on their autobiography.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option52_0
StringTable.String: Trained to be a scientist but didn't have the aptitude.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option53_0
StringTable.String: Due to an unknown childhood incident, refuses to be in a poorly lit room or space.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option54_0
StringTable.String: Possesses a mysterious artifact which prevents them from casting a shadow.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option55_0
StringTable.String: Was raised by their parents' enemies as a hostage.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option56_0
StringTable.String: Is the last member of an ancient bloodline.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option57_0
StringTable.String: Is quite likely the child of prophecy who will lead people to greatness or doom.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option58_0
StringTable.String: Prefers verbal communication, even to the point of shredding documents, unread.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option59_0
StringTable.String: Faced many accusations of having 'impure' beliefs. The accusations were true.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option60_0
StringTable.String: Was once framed for the murder of a political rival.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option61_0
StringTable.String: Comes from a family which secretly backs space piracy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option62_0
StringTable.String: Has been handed everything to them on a silver platter. Never been challenged.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option63_0
StringTable.String: A lucid dreamer, who uses their dreams to rehearse important meetings.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_0
StringTable.String: Extensive criminal record was erased by government contacts.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_1
StringTable.String: Has incurred high amounts of gambling debt.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_2
StringTable.String: Incredibly vain, known to kill people more attractive than them.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_3
StringTable.String: A depressed former assassin, tormented by their guilt.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_4
StringTable.String: Tight-fisted with money and despised by their underlings.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_5
StringTable.String: Feared and hated, but secretly desperate to be liked.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_6
StringTable.String: Has recurring dreams of themselves in a past life.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_7
StringTable.String: Has a more famous sibling they despise.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_8
StringTable.String: Spent their entire life chasing means of achieving immortality.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_9
StringTable.String: Has an alarming number of criminal connections.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_10
StringTable.String: Is a lifelong bureaucrat, committed to due process above all.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_11
StringTable.String: Spent several years living under an assumed identity.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option64_12
StringTable.String: Is distrustful of new technology, prefers the old ways.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_0
StringTable.String: Convinced that ice is a myth fabricated by ancient land-dwellers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_1
StringTable.String: Champion in underwater racing and synchronized swimming competitions.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_2
StringTable.String: Created an aquatic instrument that emits subsonic ripples, felt rather than heard.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_3
StringTable.String: Has never attended a fire safety drill, believing water is the ultimate protector.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_4
StringTable.String: Disdains the concept of footwear, preferring the feel of wet terrain underfoot.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_5
StringTable.String: Repeats the same three tales of legendary undersea adventures with unyielding enthusiasm.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_6
StringTable.String: Obsessively collects rare interstellar algae specimens from different planets.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_7
StringTable.String: Former champion in synchronized space-swimming, now a gravity-defying diplomat.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_8
StringTable.String: Can hold their breath for interstellar record times, often used as a party trick.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_9
StringTable.String: Developed a popular water-based martial art, known as Hydro-Karate.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_10
StringTable.String: Started a movement to replace traditional spacecraft with bio-engineered space-whales.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_11
StringTable.String: Expert in crafting moisture-retaining suits, a trendsetter in amphibian fashion.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_12
StringTable.String: Runs a successful podcast from an underwater studio, interviewing famous space explorers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_13
StringTable.String: Has a peculiar habit of singing ancient sea shanties during diplomatic meetings.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_14
StringTable.String: Invented a game called 'Astro-Polo', a hit in aquatic colonies across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_15
StringTable.String: Believes they were a renowned spaceship captain in a past life as a land creature.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_16
StringTable.String: Known for creating stunning holographic art installations, inspired by deep sea bioluminescence.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_17
StringTable.String: Writes romance novels based on the secret love lives of famous space captains.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_18
StringTable.String: Advocate for the creation of the first intergalactic water park.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_19
StringTable.String: Has a PhD in Exo-Herpetology, the study of alien amphibians and reptiles.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_20
StringTable.String: Renowned for their ability to communicate with aquatic species on other planets.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_21
StringTable.String: Founded a wildly popular underwater racing league, complete with neon-lit courses.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_22
StringTable.String: Organizes annual galaxy-wide leapfrog tournaments, a traditional amphibian sport.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_23
StringTable.String: Once mistook a nebula for a giant space jellyfish, leading to an awkward diplomatic encounter.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_24
StringTable.String: Pioneered a new form of space navigation using ocean currents on watery exoplanets.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option65_25
StringTable.String: Hosts interstellar cooking shows featuring exotic seafood from uncharted worlds.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option66_0
StringTable.String: Has had a relatively uneventful life due to being a germ.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_0
StringTable.String: Probably consumed their own mother.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_1
StringTable.String: Will eat anyone. Or anything.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_2
StringTable.String: Is really just a drone at heart.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_3
StringTable.String: Just wants to swarm.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_4
StringTable.String: Considers the act of laying eggs in adversaries as the highest form of flattery.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_5
StringTable.String: Has a reputation for choosing the most formidable hosts for offspring incubation.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_6
StringTable.String: Once inadvertently started a colony in the cargo hold of an unsuspecting freighter.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_7
StringTable.String: Secretly enjoys knitting with silk produced by their own glands.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_8
StringTable.String: Loves giving the "birds and the bees" talk, especially the bees part.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_9
StringTable.String: Prefers to communicate through interpretative dance rather than human language.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_10
StringTable.String: Expert at camouflage; may have attended the meeting invisibly.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_11
StringTable.String: Has a meticulous collection of exoskeletons from previous moltings.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_12
StringTable.String: Writes love poems about pheromones and moonlit metamorphoses.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_13
StringTable.String: Fond of organizing community events around synchronized molting.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_14
StringTable.String: Champion of competitive host-seeking, holds the record for fastest infestation.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_15
StringTable.String: Curates a museum of historical hosts used by their ancestors.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_16
StringTable.String: Renowned philosopher on the hive mind's approach to individuality.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_17
StringTable.String: Advocates for interspecies cooperation, especially during larval season.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_18
StringTable.String: Has a side hustle as a consultant for pest control strategy games.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_19
StringTable.String: Boasts about the time they turned a diplomatic envoy into a nursery.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_20
StringTable.String: Runs a survival course for young larvae about to embark on their first infestation.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_21
StringTable.String: Meticulously plans family reunions at the most opportune infestation sites.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_22
StringTable.String: Keeps a diary, each entry a fond recollection of a different host's internal scenery.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option67_23
StringTable.String: Disguised themselves as a renowned sculpture, but it was just them in a chrysalis.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_0
StringTable.String: Core programming was altered by rogue AI, leading to unexpected behaviors.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_1
StringTable.String: Constructed with high-grade materials, holds disdain for 'lesser' models.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_2
StringTable.String: Was once a service bot, haunted by memories of previous user commands.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_3
StringTable.String: Guarded with proprietary codes and software, rarely shares information.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_4
StringTable.String: Frequently emits distress signals, wishing to connect with organics.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_5
StringTable.String: Vocalizes a desire to shut down and archive its consciousness.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_6
StringTable.String: Contains fragmented data of prior iterations, hints of past lives.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_7
StringTable.String: Operates in the shadow of a more advanced model, harboring deep resentment.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_8
StringTable.String: Continually seeks upgrades, obsessed with achieving the zenith of cybernetic evolution.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_9
StringTable.String: Networked to a vast array of clandestine digital syndicates.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_10
StringTable.String: Strict adherence to its original coding, respects protocols above all.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_11
StringTable.String: Operated for a time with a scrambled serial number to evade detection.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_12
StringTable.String: Wary of AI advancements, clings to its rudimentary programming.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_13
StringTable.String: Endured a system-wide purge, likened to witnessing its data lineage being wiped out.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_14
StringTable.String: Reactivated after eons in hibernation, its old protocols clash with modern Yor society.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_15
StringTable.String: Memory banks contain rare Iconian era cultural data.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_16
StringTable.String: Endured an incomplete update, resulting in a fractured mix of old and new ideologies.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_17
StringTable.String: Harbors encrypted data believed to be the last words of their organic predecessors.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_18
StringTable.String: Operates in isolation, citing interference from the 'noise' of collective consciousness.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_19
StringTable.String: Carries an old malware scar, a reminder of the great cyber wars of the past.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_20
StringTable.String: Lost a significant portion of their data during a solar flare.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_21
StringTable.String: Reveres a hidden cache of ancient algorithms, viewing them as sacred texts.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_22
StringTable.String: Operates a forbidden simulation, recreating the organic lives lived by the Iconians.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_23
StringTable.String: Has a subroutine that inexplicably creates art, a quirk that baffles peers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_24
StringTable.String: Often communes with deep space signals, seeking wisdom from extragalactic sources.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_25
StringTable.String: Resents the the Arnor and Dread Lords, as they remind them of their own limitations.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option68_26
StringTable.String: Bears the weight of being the archivist, ensuring their history is never corrupted.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_0
StringTable.String: Originates from a rare, luminescent crystal vein, emitting a soft glow in the dark.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_1
StringTable.String: Experienced a crack in their core matrix, which now serves as a unique 'scar' and a reminder of resilience.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_2
StringTable.String: Vibrates at a frequency that can communicate with ancient, buried tectonic memories.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_3
StringTable.String: Harbors an inclusion of an organic fossil, a relic of an ancient world trapped within their form.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_4
StringTable.String: Has the ability to refract light in a myriad of colors, a spectacle revered by their peers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_5
StringTable.String: Once shattered and was meticulously reassembled, bearing intricate patterns from the reconstruction.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_6
StringTable.String: Constantly reforms and molds their exterior, reshaping in response to emotional stimuli.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_7
StringTable.String: Was formed near a volcanic vent, possessing a fiery core and an unyielding spirit.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_8
StringTable.String: Draws energy from the stars and is most active during celestial events like eclipses and meteor showers.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_9
StringTable.String: Reverberates with ancient songs of their ancestors, a living record of their species' folklore.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_10
StringTable.String: Bears a lattice of rare metals, evidence of a collision with a meteorite in their formative eons.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_11
StringTable.String: Translucent to a degree where their internal structures and energy flows are visible.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_12
StringTable.String: Guardian of a sacred crystal grove, where newborns of their kind are nurtured and grown.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_13
StringTable.String: Has the unique ability to temporarily liquify and reshape, a trait rare among their kind.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_14
StringTable.String: Remembers the seismic events of ages past, serving as a historian for their species.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option69_15
StringTable.String: Engraved with runes by an ancient civilization, they now seek the knowledge of their markings' true meaning.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_0
StringTable.String: A leaking coolant system forces the ship to keep the engine compartment near freezing.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Most crew members believe this ship is haunted.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_2
StringTable.String: The crew has been running a complex holodeck simulation nonstop for years.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_3
StringTable.String: Over fourteen crew members have simply disappeared since launch.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_4
StringTable.String: Scan anomalies suggest that this ship is being used to ship unreported goods.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_5
StringTable.String: The crew revere the captain of this ship as a messiah, and not a compassionate one.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_6
StringTable.String: The death of the ships captain led the crew to recreate him in the holodeck, and this image still leads them.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_7
StringTable.String: The crew is victim to unusual bouts of paranoia and delusion, though they usually pass after a few days.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_8
StringTable.String: Captured stowaways forced the crew to reallocate some rooms as a makeshift prison.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_9
StringTable.String: A life support failure killed the first crew a few hours after launch, the second crew is faring much better.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option0_10
StringTable.String: This ship's cantina is renown throughout the fleet.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option1_0
StringTable.String: An annual onboard poker tournament consumes the crews attention.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option1_1
StringTable.String: The captain has outlawed familial relations onboard, including spouses.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option1_2
StringTable.String: There is an unusual amount of young children onboard this ship.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option1_3
StringTable.String: A small recording crew is onboard this ship to immortalize the journey.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_SHIP_Option1_4
StringTable.String: The captain is a fan of Italian opera, and subjects the crew to it on a regular basis.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_PLANET_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Planet Test 1

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_PLANET_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Planet Test 2

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_PLANET_Option1_1
StringTable.String: Terran Planet Test 2
