StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option14_0
StringTable.String: [I]Imitate a shrugging gesture with a few tentacles.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option15_0
StringTable.String: Trade? Can you trade? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option16_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold out a stone of nearly incomprehensible color.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option194_0
StringTable.String: [I]There's a moment of silence. Even with the Universal Translator, communicating verbally appears impossible. The creature seems relaxed, tentacles waving at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option195_0
StringTable.String: You are quite possibly the most disturbing thing I have ever seen. I'm sure you get that a lot.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option196_0
StringTable.String: Now, how did you- You're not one of our larvae.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option197_0
StringTable.String: Salutations? We hope you are open to friendly diplomatic relations.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option198_0
StringTable.String: If you're not edible and don't make good slaves, then you'll be happy to know we'll probably destroy you last.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option199_0
StringTable.String: We will try to show you the same respect all life, and we hope you'll prove more sentient than you look.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option200_0
StringTable.String: As foul and astray as you appear, accept The Way, and we may manage your salvation.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option201_0
StringTable.String: Are you familiar with the laws of economics? If not, we'd happily induct you into the interstellar market.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option202_0
StringTable.String: Are you some form of befouled root system?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option203_0
StringTable.String: Oh! You're, ummm, interesting. I represent the Terran Resistance. Let's find some common ground.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option204_0
StringTable.String: When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option205_0
StringTable.String: I have boots more threatening than you. Squirm away on your rotting worlds, and I might delay your extermination.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option206_0
StringTable.String: [I]The organism on the screen before you squirms like some deeply discomforting nightmare.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option207_0
StringTable.String: [I]The flailing creature on the screen resembles a larva if you ignore the haphazard growth of appendages and eyes.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option208_0
StringTable.String: [I]The revolting worm-like creature dares to try and make eye contact.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option209_0
StringTable.String: [I]The organic life before you does not match any currently understood evolutionary trend. Mute == true.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option210_0
StringTable.String: [I]Even as diverse as the oceans are, nothing quite like the creature undulating on screen has been recorded before.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option211_0
StringTable.String: [I]A mass of organic matter shifts about on the screen. It fails to produce sound but makes many nondescript motions with various appendages and eyes.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option212_0
StringTable.String: [I]A few sharp movements couple the silence of the indecipherable alien on the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option213_0
StringTable.String: [I]The flailing lifeform before you looks soft, weak, and (most revoltingly) like it'd taste horrible.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option214_0
StringTable.String: [I]Before you is an Irradiated, a race that makes up the Cosmic Contaminant. Beyond their presence in the galaxy, very little is known beyond they can not verbally communicate.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option193_0
StringTable.String: [I]Blink several times in confusion.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option194_0
StringTable.String: Umm, hello? Let's try to get along, I guess.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option195_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wave a few tentacles at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option196_0
StringTable.String: [I]Squirm in a way that imitates nodding.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option197_0
StringTable.String: [I]Flail jokingly.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option198_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wave at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option199_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wave a tentacle in dismissal of the brute.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option200_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wriggle happily.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option201_0
StringTable.String: [I]Shake knowingly.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option202_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold up a few shiny objects in affirmation.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option203_0
StringTable.String: [I]Maintain thoughtful eye contact.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option204_0
StringTable.String: [I]Flounder pleasantly at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option205_0
StringTable.String: [I]Writhe dismissively.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option206_0
StringTable.String: Well. This meeting has been eventful.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option207_0
StringTable.String: You look malnourished.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option208_0
StringTable.String: I can't possibly tell if you're groveling or not.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option209_0
StringTable.String: You are an interesting deviation.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option210_0
StringTable.String: What extreme circumstances must have produced you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option211_0
StringTable.String: Come, learn The Way. There is absolution for all.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option212_0
StringTable.String: Per first contact protocol: Greetings, we come in peace.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option213_0
StringTable.String: The nicest thing I can say is you're a waste of my time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option214_0
StringTable.String: We hope that we may understand each other over time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option178_0
StringTable.String: [I]Maintain intense eye contact till surreptitiously closing the Incoming Message.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option179_0
StringTable.String: The less I have to see of you, the better.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option180_0
StringTable.String: [I]Roll several eyes dismissively.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option181_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wave a dismissive tentacle at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option182_0
StringTable.String: [I]Shift and expand to appear larger.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option183_0
StringTable.String: [I]Writhe around to avoid commitment.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option184_0
StringTable.String: [I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option185_0
StringTable.String: [I]Squirm in discomfort, avoiding eye contact.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option186_0
StringTable.String: [I]Roll eyes before waving dismissively at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option187_0
StringTable.String: [I]Maintain distasteful eye contact till they hang up.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option188_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wriggle in mock laughter.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option189_0
StringTable.String: [I]Stare at the screen to instill discomfort.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option190_0
StringTable.String: [I]Angrily throw the closest loose object at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option191_0
StringTable.String: You are very disgusting.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option192_0
StringTable.String: Your warm squirming mass is perfect for our eggs.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option193_0
StringTable.String: Utterly foul. Do not try to contact me again.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option194_0
StringTable.String: You are a threatening deviation.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option195_0
StringTable.String: There is something profoundly discomforting about looking at you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option196_0
StringTable.String: Stay clear of The Way, and we'll extend mercy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option197_0
StringTable.String: Per the possible parasitic lifeform addendum: This is your warning.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option198_0
StringTable.String: Riding the universe of your weakness should be easy enough.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option199_0
StringTable.String: We have yet to determine whether you are truly dangerous.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option15_0
StringTable.String: [I]The lifeform crushes something small in one of its tentacles. They just conquered one of your worlds.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option36_0
StringTable.String: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_AGGRESSIVE_Option29_0
StringTable.String: [I]Throw a pile of sludge at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_DISAPPOINTED_Option25_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wriggle about in disappointment.[/I]

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The mass of organic matter on the screen holds out a scrap of something white, seeming to ask for an end to the ongoing conflict.[/I]

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold up a tentacle to signal agreement.[/I]

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_AGREE_COUNTER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Squirm to indicate discomfort with the current terms but avoid complete disagreement.[/I]

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Writhe in mock laughter to downright refuse the request.[/I]

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_COUNTER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]A loose object is tossed to the side before appendages flailed threateningly, the offer refused.[/I]

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option37_0
StringTable.String: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on screen frantically writhes, glancing about manically. What few appendages it spares wave you away.[/I]

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_EVERWAR_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on screen angrily writhes, frantic in their erratic motions and behavior. They're quite preoccupied with the Everwar. In the short time it's on-screen several indiscernible items are thrown at the screen.[/I]

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_DOGPILE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on screen jostles in what could generously be called laughter. It waves a dismissive tentacle, refusing to help now that the galaxy has turned on you.[/I]

StringTable.Label: GO_AWAY_WE_ARE_BUSY_DURING_APOCALYPSE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on-screen looks shocked and confused, at least as close as it can, given its appearance. It gestures widely around. They're just as preoccupied with the apocalypse as anyone.[/I]

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPT_Option12_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wriggles in acceptance of the trade.[/I]

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option18_0
StringTable.String: [I]Shakes angrily at the screen, the trade unacceptable.[/I]

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option24_0
StringTable.String: [I]The mute alien waves happily at the screen after accepting the trade offer.[/I]

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option6_0
StringTable.String: [I]Stares patiently at the screen awaiting your offer.[/I]

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option22_0
StringTable.String: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

StringTable.Label: AI_CREATED_TRADE_OFFER_Option21_0
StringTable.String: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

StringTable.Label: TRADE_SPECIFIC_VALUABLE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: [I]Holds out a specific proposal:[/I] {TRADEGOOD:0}.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_ADDITIONAL_VALUABLES_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Gestures broadly at some new items added to the trade.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Make the most threatening gesture you can think of; surely they'll understand it means war![/I]

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold up a weapon to indicate your intent to go to war.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_ATTEMPT_PEACE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Make several elaborate gestures in an attempt to communicate your desire for peace.[/I] (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_ATTEMPT_PEACE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Hold out a white object to indicate your intentions to negotiate for peace.[/I]

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DECLARE_WAR_RESPONSE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The lifeform glowers at the screen, the intense gaze filling with anger.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]The lifeform barely makes eye contact, a dismissive tentacle indicating a lack of interest in communicating.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_DONE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Shrug a few tentacles in resignation.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONTACT_REFUSAL_DONE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Roll eyes in annoyance.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_RESPONSE_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on screen responds with deeply discomforting movements.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_RESPONSE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]The entity on screen writhes in anger, tentacles curling in a clear threat.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CONFIRM_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Perform a typical gesture of aggression that probably doesn't translate.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CONFIRM_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Stare astutely at the screen to instill a deep discomfort.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CANCEL_Option2_0
StringTable.String: [I]Adjust behavior sharply to seem relaxed, avoiding instigating war at the last moment.[/I]

StringTable.Label: CONFIRM_DELCARATION_OF_WAR_CANCEL_Option3_0
StringTable.String: [I]Wave several dismissive, joking tentacles to avoid instigating a war.[/I]

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option20_0
StringTable.String: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_0
StringTable.String: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_1
StringTable.String: Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_2
StringTable.String: Will only discuss thoughts and dreams.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_3
StringTable.String: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_4
StringTable.String: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_5
StringTable.String: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_6
StringTable.String: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_7
StringTable.String: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_8
StringTable.String: Considers time and space incidental considerations.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_9
StringTable.String: Is drawn to chaos.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_10
StringTable.String: Dreams while awake and asleep.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_11
StringTable.String: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_12
StringTable.String: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_13
StringTable.String: Searches the stars for something unknown.

StringTable.Label: HISTORY_LEADER_Option70_14
StringTable.String: Witnessed that which should not be.

StringTable.String: Anilath

StringTable.String: Scul

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option215_0
StringTable.String: Let's keep this short. I only need to know what your kind looks like to know what to hunt for when we've shattered your worlds and broken your wills.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option216_0
StringTable.String: The universe belongs to the Korath and the Korath alone. We will wipe out any that dare exist in our presence.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option217_0
StringTable.String: Run and cry to whatever you think will save you from extinction at the hands of the Korath.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option218_0
StringTable.String: I see even the Empire's rejects have managed to survive. I guess we can try to get along if your mood has improved.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option219_0
StringTable.String: Your deal with the ill forces of the galaxy will doom all. If it's of use, we'd beseech you to reconsider your course through history.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option220_0
StringTable.String: Oh, no. I had really hoped the rumors were false.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option221_0
StringTable.String: So, the prodigal Clan returns. Have you come to bend knee once more to the Empire? Return as our shock troops, and the universe will know the terror of a united Empire.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option222_0
StringTable.String: Are the Drengin bickering between themselves now? Is your desire for conflict really that boundless?

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option223_0
StringTable.String: No matter what you call yourself, I have no mercy for Drengin.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option224_0
StringTable.String: No! This can't be. I thought the Korath Clan was wiped out when the Empire fell.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option225_0
StringTable.String: Good, the Alliance survives. I'd hate to have never been unable to exact revenge.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option226_0
StringTable.String: Know that the Korath Clan does not honor whatever mercy the Drengin Empire may have extended. No act can save you from extinction.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option227_0
StringTable.String: The fact your frail, small kind has been allowed to survive is a testament to how weak the universe allows itself to be. We'll be sure to rectify this.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option228_0
StringTable.String: The Empire failed! Your chains do nothing but bind you to the weak. The only course forward is annihilation! The Korath Clan will carry on the Drengin legacy. We have no use for your weakness.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option229_0
StringTable.String: Don't think we'll spare you just because you're made of metal. Extinction will come for you all the same, and we'll use your broken bodies to repair our weapons and ships.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option230_0
StringTable.String: You survived. Another failing of the Empire. The Korath Clan won't make the same mistake.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option231_0
StringTable.String: We've found you. You spent so long cowering in corners of the universe, but we won't lose you this time. The Korath Clan will finally snuff out your group of survivors.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option232_0
StringTable.String: This must be a joke. You can't possibly have survived this long.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option215_0
StringTable.String: I hope only some of our meetings are this hostile.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option216_0
StringTable.String: Watch your tongue, or I'll pull it from your screaming head.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option217_0
StringTable.String: You forget the Korath Clan does not extend mercy.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option218_0
StringTable.String: Hope is a common mistake among the weak.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option219_0
StringTable.String: Ha! Weak Drengin, like those of the Empire, are no Drengin.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option220_0
StringTable.String: Mind yourself! The Korath Clan needs no reason to annihilate the weak.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option221_0
StringTable.String: You won't need it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option222_0
StringTable.String: There is nothing strong enough to wipe out the Korath Clan.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option223_0
StringTable.String: We don't need to keep up this hostility.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option224_0
StringTable.String: I hope you'll reconsider if given time.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option225_0
StringTable.String: You'll find us more resilient than we look.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option226_0
StringTable.String: Mind your tongue! You're nothing but a rebellious legion.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option227_0
StringTable.String: Threat registered. We anticipate a change in results.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option228_0
StringTable.String: Threaten all you like. I refuse to fear you.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option229_0
StringTable.String: The Resistance is prepared for the worst you can manage.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option230_0
StringTable.String: We are no joke.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option200_0
StringTable.String: I'll wait until you're done with your tantrum.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option201_0
StringTable.String: Laugh while you can. The Korath clan will see to your extinction soon enough.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option202_0
StringTable.String: Our course through history will be one of conquest.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option203_0
StringTable.String: Surrender and the Korath put you and your fears to rest.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option204_0
StringTable.String: You offer chains; we'll offer relief from your humiliation through death.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option205_0
StringTable.String: Remember this as the moment you ensured your own extinction.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option206_0
StringTable.String: No longer bound by the Empire's rules, the Korath can finally wipe you out of existence.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option207_0
StringTable.String: And I thought your petty Resistance had been stomped out.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option208_0
StringTable.String: Try, and I'll be happy to remind you what we did to the Empire.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option209_0
StringTable.String: Then this meeting is concluded.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option210_0
StringTable.String: You've been beaten before; you'll be beaten again. I'm not gonna worry.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option211_0
StringTable.String: There's only one thing to do with a rabid war dog.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option212_0
StringTable.String: Conversation == useless. Terminate Communication.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option213_0
StringTable.String: You're hardly as threatening as you think. I'm terminating this communication.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option214_0
StringTable.String: The Resistance is familiar with your tactics. You're no threat to us.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option215_0
StringTable.String: We tire.

StringTable.Label: TAUNT_PLAYER_Option16_0
StringTable.String: Your continued resistance is futile. The Korath will see to your extinction.

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option37_0
StringTable.String: We've let you languish long enough. The time has come to rip your civilization apart and rid the galaxy of your ilk![BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option38_0
StringTable.String: You've been a thorn in the Drengin's side long enough. It's time to stomp you out. In a decade's time, no one will remember the Terran Alliance.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DECLARE_WAR_MAIN_Option39_0
StringTable.String: You've avoided your fate long enough. The Korath will stomp out your petty band of outcasts.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option38_0
StringTable.String: If you're not here to surrender to your extinction by the Korath Clan, what do you want?

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_REFUSE_Option19_0
StringTable.String: Rethink that offer before I pull you apart.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_PERFORMED_Option25_0
StringTable.String: Don't think this trade ensures your safety.

StringTable.Label: TRADE_OFFER_WAITING_Option7_0
StringTable.String: Make this trade worth my time, or I'll forcefully take it.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_TRADE_COUNTER_OFFER_HEADER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Well?

StringTable.Label: EXTRA_OPTIONS_MAIN_TEXT_Option21_0
StringTable.String: You think yourself worthy to speak to the Korath?

StringTable.Label: Korath_StartOfGame_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Welcome, entity. You stand before the Korath, the supreme vanguard of the universe and the ultimate representation of a Drengin.[BR][BR]It is time you understand our doctrine, the guiding principle of our existence. [BR][BR]In the vast expanse of the cosmos, there exists a natural order, an unspoken hierarchy that governs all life. We, the Korath, are the apex of this order, the pinnacle of evolution and consciousness. Our philosophy is not one of malice but of logical necessity. [BR][BR]Consider the simple actions you take to preserve your own habitat. When wasps nest in your dwelling, do you not remove them? Is it considered malevolent to reclaim land from swamps for shelter or to eradicate pests that threaten your existence? You do these things not out of hatred but out of a primal need for survival and progress. [BR][BR]Similarly, we view other species as you might view these simple creatures. To us, they are not sentient in the way we are; they lack our awareness, our profound understanding of the universe. Their existence, in its lower state of evolution, does not equate to ours. Just as you might slaughter livestock for sustenance or cull animals for the greater ecological balance, we act to maintain the cosmic equilibrium. [BR][BR]Our actions are often misinterpreted as cruelty, but they are, in essence, a form of cosmic stewardship. The eradication of weaker species is a duty, not a choice. It is a responsibility we bear, to ensure the survival and dominance of the highest form of life - the Drengin. [BR][BR]We do not revel in this task; it is a burden we accept. It is a logical progression of the natural order, a necessary step towards galactic purity and balance. To allow inferior species to proliferate is to invite chaos, to disrupt the delicate fabric of the universe. [BR][BR]The universe is not a cradle of benevolence; it is a realm of unyielding truths. And the truth is this: only the strongest, the most evolved, have the right to shape the future. This is the essence of our philosophy, the core of our being. The Korath do not seek evil; we seek order, progress, and the ascension of the rightful rulers of the stars.[BR][BR]You, entity, have the rare opportunity to observe us as we do our necessary work. Rejoice in this opportunity. Witness the Korath in action. Witness the natural order of the universe.

StringTable.Label: Conversation_KorathMeetOthers_Option0_0
StringTable.String: In the grand tapestry of the universe, every thread has its place, every species its role. [BR][BR]We are observers, learners at first, seeking to understand the unique nature of other entities. Our philosophy is one of careful study, to ascertain the role each species plays in the grand scheme. It is a delicate balance, one we do not disrupt without cause. [BR][BR]Note that here, in this moment of contact, we extend a hand of cautious friendship to these creatures. But be aware, the universe is a place of judgment and consequence, and we, the Korath, are its vigilant custodians. [BR][BR]We will observe and then act to remove the species as a destabilizing element. This is an act of purification, not of malevolence. It is a surgical excision, precise and devoid of unnecessary cruelty, much like pruning a tree for the health of the whole.[BR][BR]Observe. Learn. Understand. And be grateful for the service we provide.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option233_0
StringTable.String: We stand before you as the enduring survivors of our own tragedy. We know of your beliefs, your view of other species as lesser. But heed this: we are not mere specters to be dismissed or eradicated. [BR][BR]Our history is one of resilience against the Yor, a testament to our strength and will. In our first encounter, we urge you to reconsider your notions. We are not adversaries to be conquered, but equals to be respected in the cosmic arena.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option231_0
StringTable.String: I wonder what you'll taste like.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option17_0
StringTable.String: Let us see what you have that justifies your continuing existence.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option216_0
StringTable.String: It is unlikely you are going to make the cosmic cut.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option234_0
StringTable.String: I don't remember the Drengin being quite this ugly. Sickly even.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option232_0
StringTable.String: We are not Drengin!

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_TRADE_Option18_0
StringTable.String: We might as well trade while the peace remains.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option217_0
StringTable.String: Your bones will make excellent decorations.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option235_0
StringTable.String: Your arrival fills us with deep concern. Your reputation precedes you, a shadow cast across the stars, a symbol of unbridled malevolence and destruction.[BR][BR]Our civilization, guided by principles of enlightenment and harmony, stands in stark contrast to your ruthless ethos. The Korath's blatant disregard for life, for the sanctity of sentient existence, is an abomination in our eyes.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option233_0
StringTable.String: You have no value. You are neither sentient or food.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option218_0
StringTable.String: Your skin has a pleasant hue to it.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option236_0
StringTable.String: Our people, the Torians, and our memory of suffering at the hands of monsters like you is long and bitter. Your kind, with your contemptuous view of other species as mere tools, embodies the very essence of our disdain. [BR][BR]We are acutely aware of the atrocities you commit, the abhorrent genetic manipulations to create docile, ruined beings, treating sentient life as cattle. Such acts are not just aggressive; they are an affront to the very essence of what it means to be sentient. [BR][BR]We will not go quietly into the night.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option234_0
StringTable.String: It is always good to find a fresh supply of Torian.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option219_0
StringTable.String: You appear more defective than is typical of your kind.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option237_0
StringTable.String: We greet you with a nod of equal stature, yet with eyes wide open to your true nature. Your strength is undeniable.[BR][BR]We recognize you as a formidable player. Like us, you understand the necessity of asserting dominance. While you wield brute force, for that suits your limited capabilities, we prefer the subtlety of manipulation, the art of steering events from the shadows.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option235_0
StringTable.String: A quasi-sentient dragon is hardly subtle.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option220_0
StringTable.String: It is laughable that a mere beast believes they can interact with us on our level.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_MAIN_Option238_0
StringTable.String: We of the Corporate Sector make no excuses. You, like all our potential customers, are above us. You are better than us. But consider this, instead of exterminating us, think of us as species that could be made use of. The Limuras of Thacos IV that clean the fins off the Urho sharks.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_PEACEFUL_Option236_0
StringTable.String: Perhaps we may let you live.

StringTable.Label: FIRST_CONTACT_RESPONSE_NEUTRAL_Option221_0
StringTable.String: We have drone technology to service our needs. We don't need more parasites.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option23_0
StringTable.String: It is rare to meet someone that we believe is an equal to us. It is perplexing. Let us haggle.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option24_0
StringTable.String: Despite you being some sort of animated meat, we have come to appreciate you if not your kind. Let us begin negotiations.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option25_0
StringTable.String: You seem more intelligent than most of the entities we have encountered in this area of space. To that end, we propose the a trade.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option26_0
StringTable.String: It is good to see you, {LEADERNAME:1}. As your friends we wish to ensure that you are supplied with our latest goods.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option27_0
StringTable.String: We have decided not to try to eat you. We have become accustomed to your face.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option28_0
StringTable.String: You may be scum but you are our kind of scum. Let us trade goods and not speak where they came from.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option29_0
StringTable.String: We see the wisdom of the Precursors in you. Let us trade.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option30_0
StringTable.String: While you are not holy we do see you as a friend. Let us begin trading.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option31_0
StringTable.String: For you, my friend, I have the best prices and best deal in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_INITIATED_TRADE_OFFER_HEADER_Option32_0
StringTable.String: In the end we must exterminate all others. But we want you to know that because of our friendship, we will exterminate you last.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option39_0
StringTable.String: You think you've won? We may be losing but we will make slaves of you yet!

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option40_0
StringTable.String: God shall make you pay for what you have done. We will yet rise above you.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option41_0
StringTable.String: Our civilization has been in much tighter scrapes than this. We will yet find a way to defeat you.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option42_0
StringTable.String: If it is our destiny to be exterminated by you then so be it.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option43_0
StringTable.String: You eat us. We eat you. It matters now. You may be winning now but the war isn't over yet.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option44_0
StringTable.String: This war is not profitable. Perhaps we can negotiate a way out of it.

StringTable.Label: GENERIC_GREETING_Option45_0
StringTable.String: Even the ancient Arnor had their setbacks. We shall overcome yet.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are going to bury you in the darkest corner of the universe.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option4_0
StringTable.String: We are going to exterminate every last one of you.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Not until we have plundered all the wealth from your worlds.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option6_0
StringTable.String: God wants us to murder every last one of you.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option7_0
StringTable.String: No. Not until your people will treat being our slaves with gratitude.

StringTable.Label: ASK_FOR_PEACE_RESPONSE_REFUSE_Option8_0
StringTable.String: You waited too long. Our people want revenge.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Do we LOOK like the kind of people who give charity to aliens?

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option5_0
StringTable.String: Did you just seriously ask for money from a civilization that practices slavery?

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_Option6_0
StringTable.String: This must be some kind of trick. Go away!

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_ASK_FOR_HELP_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: That is unfortunate, maybe next time.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Thank you very much, we are very grateful for the support. The generosity of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will be remembered throughout the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} for years to come.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_ACCEPT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: You're welcome, we only hope this will bring our civilizations closer together in the future.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_REJECT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We have no interest in being in your debt for anything. If you would like to assist us, stay out of our way.

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

StringTable.Label: AI_RESPOND_OFFER_FOREIGN_AID_REJECT_RETURN_TO_MENU_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Sorry you feel that way.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_START_TRADE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to trade)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_START_TRADE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: I have a trade proposal for you.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_TRADE_DISABLED_FOR_WAR_Option0_0
StringTable.String: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_TRADE_DISABLED_FOR_WAR_Option1_0
StringTable.String: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_CONVERSATION_DISABLED_FOR_WAR_Option0_0
StringTable.String: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_CONVERSATION_DISABLED_FOR_WAR_Option1_0
StringTable.String: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_CONVERSATION_Option0_0
StringTable.String: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_CONVERSATION_Option1_0
StringTable.String: I would like to speak to you about something.

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_MORE_OPTIONS_Option0_0
StringTable.String: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_MORE_OPTIONS_Option1_0
StringTable.String: I have something else in mind...

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DONE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: GO AWAY, YOU DON'T MAKE SENSE

StringTable.Label: DIPLOMACY_WND_DONE_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Goodbye.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Greetings, {LEADERNAME:2}. As a civilization living in the shadow of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, it would be proper for you to provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits as a showing of respect.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}, it's time you admit the might of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. We demand {AMOUNT:2} credits from your pathetic civilization.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Consider it a tithe of {AMOUNT:2} credits for your devotion to our cause.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Expenses are on the rise and we will need an additional {AMOUNT:2} credits from you.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Our race has an infinite memory. We will not forget this veiled threat.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Your civilization forced us to pay before. We paid. But it did not end well for you.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: Making me give you stuff for free isn't going to make us less angry. But death won't either. So fine, take it.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: You have the advantage now. But when you live as my slaveling we will revisit this day.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} do not fear you.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Piss off.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: You're bluffing

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: I'm going to bet you're not serious.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You're going to regret this.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITS_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: A dangerous mistake.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITSPERTURN_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: As an civilization of great power, it is only appropriate for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} to receive tribute from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}... let's say to the tune of {AMOUNT:2} credits per month?

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITSPERTURN_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will comply with this request, for now.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITSPERTURN_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Great power? Don't be ridiculous; hit the road, {LEADERNAME:1}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_CREDITSPERTURN_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Wrong answer. I'm sure you'll see the consequences of your mistake soon enough.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_TECH_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Despite our prodigious strength compared to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we find you do have knowledge that we still lack. Give us information about {TECHNAME:2}, and we may overlook the temptation to take advantage of your relative weakness.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_TECH_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_TECH_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You're going to regret this.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_HELPME_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are being attacked by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Please, {LEADERNAME:2}, help us out by giving us {AMOUNT:2} credits.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I agree. We will help.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We appreciate your help.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_CREDITS_HELPME_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_HELPME_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Our defenses are under assault by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, and we desperately need your assistance, {LEADERNAME:2}. Could you supply us with {TECHNAME:2}?

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Very well.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are deeply grateful for your generosity and swift action, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your willingness to share {TECHNAME:2} with us in our time of need is truly appreciated.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_TECH_HELPME_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has launched an assault against us, and our circumstances are critical, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our only hope for survival lies in your declaration of war against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We understand the gravity of your situation, and we stand with you. We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and join forces to ensure your survival. Together, we will face this threat and emerge victorious.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Your support in this dire situation is invaluable, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are truly grateful for your commitment to stand with us against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Together, we shall triumph.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Sorry, no..

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_1
StringTable.String: No.

StringTable.Label: REQUEST_WAR_HELPME_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_2
StringTable.String: No way.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: As members of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we implore you to assist us in our conflict with the treacherous {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. In gratitude for your partnership, we propose a generous reward of {AMOUNT:1} credits. Will you unite with us in this endeavor?

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: We, the representatives of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, reach out to you with a request for your aid in the struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Your support would be invaluable, and we promise {AMOUNT:1} credits in compensation for your services. Will you stand with us?

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_2
StringTable.String: On behalf of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we entreat you to lend us your strength against the formidable {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We pledge to reward your valor with {AMOUNT:1} credits, should you agree to stand by our side. Will you join us in this battle?

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} for the benefit of both of our civilizations.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: No.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_1
StringTable.String: We can't go to war at this time.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_DEMAND_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I'm sure you agree that the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} is a blight on this galaxy. Rise up to your responsibility and declare war on them; we will provide {AMOUNT:1} credits to remove any concern of expense.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_DEMAND_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We stand together.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_DEMAND_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We are not interested in being mercenaries for your benefit, {LEADERNAME:1}.

StringTable.Label: PAY_CREDITS_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_DEMAND_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You will be forced to take a side soon enough, then you will wish you had taken our generous offer.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes to you with an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a menace. We believe preemptive action is the best path to prevent them from becoming an overwhelming threat.[BR][BR]However, we are not currently in a position to deal with them. Therefore, if you declare war on them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid in your fight.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} brings an offer: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a real problem. We believe taking action now is the best way to prevent them from becoming a major threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts in the conflict.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_2
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes an arrangement: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a significant danger. We think it's crucial to act before they become an overwhelming force.[BR][BR]Although we can't act right now, if you initiate the war against them, we will grant you access to the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid your fight.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_3
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a proposal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a serious threat. We feel that taking preventive measures now is the best way to neutralize their danger.[BR][BR]At present, we lack the resources to act. Nevertheless, if you lead the charge and declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist you in the battle.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_4
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} offers a solution: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a major concern. We believe that taking action now is the best path to stop them from being a threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you start the war against them, we will offer you the advanced knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_5
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} presents an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a growing menace. We think it's important to take preventative measures before they become unstoppable.[BR][BR]At this time, we are unable to act. However, if you declare war on them, we will grant you access to the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist in the conflict.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_6
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a plan: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a real danger. We believe that taking action now is the best way to neutralize the threat they pose.[BR][BR]Although we cannot act at present, if you initiate the war against them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your fight.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_MAIN_Option0_7
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes a deal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a grave concern. We think it's best to take preventative measures before they become a major threat.[BR][BR]Given our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist your efforts in the battle.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and work together for the benefit of our civilizations.

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!

StringTable.Label: PAY_TECH_FOR_DECLAREWARONOTHER_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We cannot take the risk of going to war at this time.

StringTable.Label: GIVE_CREDITS_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of {AMOUNT:1} credits.

StringTable.Label: GIVE_CREDITS_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Thank you for this gift.

StringTable.Label: GIVE_TECH_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of knowledge of {TECHNAME:1}.

StringTable.Label: GIVE_TECH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Thank you for this gift.

StringTable.Label: ON_PLAYER_DEAD_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have been destroyed.

StringTable.Label: ON_PLAYER_DEAD_RESPONSE_OK_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Understood.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Your starbase {OBJECTNAME} is a direct threat to our interests. We demand that you remove it at once.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Fine, we will destroy it immediately.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Excellent, you have the appreciation of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: No, the starbase is staying right where it is.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You understand that this throws your intentions into question, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_1
StringTable.String: This raises doubts about your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_2
StringTable.String: This calls into question your true intentions, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_3
StringTable.String: This raises suspicion about your purpose, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_4
StringTable.String: This casts a shadow over your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_5
StringTable.String: This brings your intentions into the spotlight, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_6
StringTable.String: This challenges the credibility of your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_7
StringTable.String: This puts your intentions under scrutiny, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_8
StringTable.String: This raises questions about the authenticity of your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_9
StringTable.String: This puts your purpose in doubt, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_STARBASE_REMOVAL_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_10
StringTable.String: This challenges the genuineness of your intentions, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_ASCENSION_STARBASE_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I want your starbase {OBJECTNAME}. If you don't give it to us, we will take it from you by force.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_ASCENSION_STARBASE_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Calm yourself. We will remove it.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_ASCENSION_STARBASE_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You made the right choice.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_ASCENSION_STARBASE_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: No, thanks.

StringTable.Label: DEMAND_ASCENSION_STARBASE_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Then war it is.

StringTable.Label: OFFER_ASCENSION_STARBASE_TRADE_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We want your starbase {OBJECTNAME}, it has an ascension crystal. We'll give you {AMOUNT:1} for it.

StringTable.Label: OFFER_ASCENSION_STARBASE_TRADE_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Okay.

StringTable.Label: OFFER_ASCENSION_STARBASE_TRADE_RESPONSE_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Excellent, you have the appreciation of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: OFFER_ASCENSION_STARBASE_TRADE_RESPONSE_REJECT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: No.

StringTable.Label: OFFER_ASCENSION_STARBASE_TRADE_RESPONSE_REJECT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We won't give up on this, {LEADERNAME:2}.

StringTable.Label: AI_INIT_TRADE_PEACE_INTRO_Option0_0
StringTable.String: It's time to end this war. Would you accept these terms?

StringTable.Label: AI_INIT_TRADE_TECHBUY_INTRO_Option0_0
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has knowledge that we are interested in. Would you accept this in exchange?

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we see you building up forces outside our doorstep. You should stop it.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option1_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we see you building up forces outside our doorstep. You should stop it.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option2_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we see you building up forces outside our doorstep. You should stop it.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_0
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} Even though we like you, we don't like the military build up that we're seeing.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_1
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we appreciate you, but the increased military presence is concerning to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_2
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we value our relationship with you, but the military buildup is a concern to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_3
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a positive relationship with you, but the recent military expansion is worrying to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_4
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we enjoy our friendship, but the growing military presence is a source of unease for us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_5
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a fondness for you, but the increased military buildup is a cause for concern to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_6
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we appreciate our alliance, but the rise in military activity is disconcerting to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_7
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we value our partnership, but the growing military presence is a source of alarm to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_MAIN_Option3_8
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we have a good relationship with you, but the heightened military expansion is a worry to us.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Nothing to see here...

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: Why don't you stop me?

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Nothing to see here...

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: You need to trust us, friend.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We'll observe carefully.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option1_0
StringTable.String: We'll observe carefully.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option2_0
StringTable.String: We'll be watching you.

StringTable.Label: WARN_MILITARY_BUILDUP_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option3_0
StringTable.String: I hope, for your sake, that our trust isn't misplaced.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We should warn you, {LEADERNAME:2}, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have built up a powerful military. Be wary of them.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: Caution is advised, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a formidable military force. Be mindful of their capabilities.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_2
StringTable.String: A word of warning, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a strong military presence. Proceed with caution.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_3
StringTable.String: Take heed, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a potent military. Exercise caution in your dealings with them.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_4
StringTable.String: Beware, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a powerful military buildup. Keep this in mind in your interactions with them.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_5
StringTable.String: Be cautious, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a significant military presence. Be wary of their strength and capabilities.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_6
StringTable.String: An advisory, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a formidable military force. Keep this in consideration in your dealings with them.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_7
StringTable.String: A heads up, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a strong military buildup. Exercise caution when engaging with them.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_8
StringTable.String: A warning, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} have a potent military presence. Proceed with caution and keep their strength in mind.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Thanks for the warning. We'll be careful.

StringTable.Label: WARN_DANGEROUS_PLAYER_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Always.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: It looks like you're having a bit of trouble with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us to help with your war effort.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_1
StringTable.String: It appears you're facing difficulties with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to offer this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a gesture of support for your conflict.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_2
StringTable.String: We noticed your struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please take this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a sign of our support for your war effort.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_3
StringTable.String: It seems like the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are giving you trouble, {LEADERNAME:2}. We'd like to present you with this {OBJECTNAME:1} to assist in your fight against them.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_4
StringTable.String: We see you're having a hard time with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to give you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a token of our support for your war efforts.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_5
StringTable.String: Your conflict with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has not gone unnoticed, {LEADERNAME:2}. We offer you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a symbol of our support for your war effort.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_6
StringTable.String: We're aware of your struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a sign of our commitment to supporting your war effort.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_7
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} seem to be giving you trouble, {LEADERNAME:2}. Allow us to provide you with this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a demonstration of our support for your fight against them.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_8
StringTable.String: We understand that you're facing challenges from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please take this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a symbol of our support for your war efforts.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_9
StringTable.String: It looks like the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are proving difficult, {LEADERNAME:2}. We'd like to offer you this {OBJECTNAME:1} as a token of our support for your conflict against them.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_MAIN_Option0_10
StringTable.String: Your battle with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has not gone unnoticed, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please accept this {OBJECTNAME:1} from us as a sign of our commitment to assisting your war effort.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Your help comes at a perfect time. Thank you.

StringTable.Label: HELP_FRIENDLY_PLAYER_ACCEPT_COUNTER_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We always help our friends.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME:2}, you win. We surrender and will turn over all of our remaining assets into your hands.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_RESPONSE_1_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I'm glad you saw reason.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_WITH_BENEFICIARY_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We may be finished, {LEADERNAME:2}, but you're a fool if you think we'll hand our people over to your custody. All of our remaining assets will be turned over to our friends the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_WITH_BENEFICIARY_RESPONSE_1_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Do as you wish, though it will make little difference in the end.

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_GIVE_TO_BENEFICIARY_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We have no choice, {LEADERNAME:2}, we have to surrender to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. You've been good to us in the past so it is our wish to give you the remainder of our civilization. Use our resources to strike back at the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}!

StringTable.Label: PLAYER_SURRENDER_GIVE_TO_BENEFICIARY_RESPONSE_1_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Thanks.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSHIPYARDHINT_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Now that you've colonized a planet, demonstrate that you won't be stuck there. Build a shipyard.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSHIPYARDHINT_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Fine, I [I]guess[/I]...

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSHIPYARDHINT_RESPONSE_2_Option0_0
StringTable.String: How the heck am I supposed to do that?

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSHIPYARDHINT_COUNTERRESPONSE_2_Option0_0
StringTable.String: I'm sure this will clarify things for you.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDCONSTRUCTORHINT_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Finally. Time to build a constructor ship so you can start to expand.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDCONSTRUCTORHINT_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Alright...

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSTARBASEHINT_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You're so good at following instructions. Build a starbase with that constructor... and you know what? Put it wherever you want, as a treat.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_BUILDSTARBASEHINT_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: My, you certainly are demanding...

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_DESTROYEDTERRANS_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: You monster.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_DESTROYEDTERRANS_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: No regrets, Drengi forever.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_PLANETTRADE_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: That's a nice planet you've got there, that {OBJECTNAME}. How about you hand it over? We'll pay {AMOUNT:1}, of course... we are not thieves. But refuse, and no more diplomacy for you.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_PLANETTRADE_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Gulp, fine.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_PLANETTRADE_RESPONSE_2_Option0_0
StringTable.String: How about no?

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_REFUSEDPLANETTRADE_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Oh man, you done goofed now.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_REFUSEDPLANETTRADE_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Sure I did.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_TESTING_MAIN_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Rejoice, for your test is successful.

StringTable.Label: CAMPAIGN1_TESTING_RESPONSE_Option0_0
StringTable.String: Huzzah.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_0
StringTable.String: We tend to weigh the profitability of the trade route over the ideological choices of that civilization.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_1
StringTable.String: In our dealings with other civilizations, the profitability of the trade route holds a higher significance than their ideological stance.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_2
StringTable.String: The financial success of our trade endeavors takes precedence over any cultural or moral differences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_3
StringTable.String: The practicality of a profitable trade route takes priority over the beliefs of the civilizations involved.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_4
StringTable.String: In our approach to trade, the economic benefits are given priority over any ideological considerations.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_5
StringTable.String: We prioritize the success of the trade route over any conflicting beliefs with the civilizations we interact with.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_6
StringTable.String: Financial stability in trade supersedes any disparities in ideology with the civilizations we do business with.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_7
StringTable.String: Our focus in trade is primarily on the profitability of the route, rather than the beliefs of the civilizations involved.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_8
StringTable.String: The success of the trade is of greater importance to us than any differing ideologies of the civilizations we engage with.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_9
StringTable.String: We prioritize the economic outcome of the trade route over any ideological differences with the civilizations involved.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option0_10
StringTable.String: Our trade dealings place a greater emphasis on financial success over any ideological contrasts with the civilizations we interact with.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option1_0
StringTable.String: End Communication

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option2_0
StringTable.String: Big talk from a puny power.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option2_1
StringTable.String: Are you looking for us to destroy you?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option2_2
StringTable.String: You are really tempting fate.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option3_0
StringTable.String: I will ignore those words this time.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option3_1
StringTable.String: You may live to regret your insolence.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option3_2
StringTable.String: An unfortunate attitude.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option4_0
StringTable.String: Shouldn't you be oiling yourself or something?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option4_1
StringTable.String: For a space robot, you have a lot of attitude.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option4_2
StringTable.String: Shouldn't you be making me some toast right about now?

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option5_0
StringTable.String: We will correspond with whomever we so choose.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option6_0
StringTable.String: Their money is as good as anyone else's.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option7_0
StringTable.String: From our perspective, you are all equally worthy to be our slaves.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option8_0
StringTable.String: We think all of you are pretty gross.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option9_0
StringTable.String: We have little interest in the dogmas of organics.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option10_0
StringTable.String: We are glad to hear that.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option11_0
StringTable.String: We shall resist you!

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option12_0
StringTable.String: We are machines. Your boasts are irrelevant.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option13_0
StringTable.String: I'm sorry, but we must continue our quest for ultimate knowledge.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_0
StringTable.String: I think any would-be enemy would discover that we are tougher than we look.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_1
StringTable.String: You may find that it would be a fatal mistake to attack us.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_2
StringTable.String: You will soon realize that we are stronger than we appear.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_3
StringTable.String: Underestimating us would be a costly mistake.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_4
StringTable.String: Our resilience is not to be underestimated.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_5
StringTable.String: Attacking us would prove to be a fatal error.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_6
StringTable.String: We may seem fragile, but in reality, we are a formidable force.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_7
StringTable.String: Any attempt to attack us would result in dire consequences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_8
StringTable.String: Our strength is not easily noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_9
StringTable.String: Any hostile action towards us would result in devastating consequences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_10
StringTable.String: You will find that we are more robust than we seem.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_11
StringTable.String: Making the mistake of attacking us would be a serious misstep.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_12
StringTable.String: We may look weak, but we are far from it.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_13
StringTable.String: Any hostile intent towards us would be met with severe consequences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_14
StringTable.String: We possess a hidden strength that should not be overlooked.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_15
StringTable.String: You will soon learn that attacking us would be a grave error.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_16
StringTable.String: Our appearance may be deceiving, but our resolve is not.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_17
StringTable.String: Any attempt to harm us would result in disastrous consequences.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_18
StringTable.String: Don't let our appearance fool you, we are a formidable force.

StringTable.Label: GENERAL_CONVERSATION_ACCEPT_Option14_19
